lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feel you should be completely honest with us from this point on, because you know, honesty, it's the easiest thing to remember.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You know, I appreciate that. I don't appreciate you casting spells to fuck with all my "mind and shit. But I've been honest! I'm going to make some honest coin, and I'm doing my fucking "best, all right? Now come on, it's this way."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's that way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "(stuttering) Not north, where we're going!" At this point, you guys can see the very edge of the water is now starting to show through the fog and you can see where bits of the lake are hitting the shoreline, and you have reached the Ounterloch in the middle of the Labenda Swamp.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, there's a lake!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With that, life delivers a pleasant surprise.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Febron.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there monsters in this lake?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know, I don't go into it. I recommend not getting too close, just in case. We "usually stay right on the coastal side of it, you know?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perfect."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (splashing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, what're you doing?! No, shit!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I go back out. I just wanted to see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The whole time you're doing that, Kiri's like (chirping). Who's keeping watch on this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keeping watch?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you and probably Beau, since you were with Febron before, make a perception check, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, 17 plus one. 18.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you guys are trudging along on the bank of this lake, heading northward, Fjord, out of the corner of your eye you see a shadow shift in the trees to the left of you. You glance back and you see something disappear behind a tree, about 40, 50 feet off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hold. I saw movement. Off to our side, 40 to 50 feet into the trees.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which side?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To the left side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's nothing over here on my side.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Should we pretend like we haven't seen it, we should just carry on as normal?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, that's not-- just no one move.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We just freeze?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fan out a little bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we don't move, that's also a little weird.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, fan out. Who wants to move towards it with me?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I will move towards it with you.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I'll come.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll take out my blade.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I'll come with you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I walk in the opposite direction.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fighters move forward, magic peoples hang back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe I shouldn't move forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys are heading towards the shadow you saw?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha, Molly, Cali, and Fjord. We'll walk towards it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I stay right where I am.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But fan out, not together. Maybe ten, 15 feet in between us. Like a fire line.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's go, I say as I walk backwards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, Molly, and Yasha like that?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I'm going as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Beau?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: And Cali, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That mini.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But fanned fire line.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, the tail's there!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look at you!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: That was a real rush job that I had to order a day before I flew out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're smexy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just pull it over here for a second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You begin to turn and approach and you guys form your line moving forward. You watch as something lumbering moves. It's still on the edge of the fog, and it shifts from the tree where it was to a tree further back and then ducks behind another tree. It's not very stealthy, though it thinks it might be.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it moving fast-- easily in this terrain?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems to be moving fairly easily in the terrain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (as Gollum) What is it?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: (as Gollum) What did you say?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, I'm going to stealthily do some monk (footsteps) up to it a bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe it's something nice!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: See if I can get a better look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a stealth check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, 14.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's happening?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you tiptoe through the edges, leaping from cluster of root to cluster of root, being as quiet as you can, you come around the first tree where this figure had vanished, look around to where it's currently waiting and you see two trees that grew together and a large rock that's wedged at the base of it. Crouched below, behind the rock, you see this bulbous humanoid creature, with a deep green-blue skin tone with little pustules and boils on it, at the edges of the shoulder and arm. You see long stringy black hair that goes past the front of the chest. The torso appears to be swollen, this belly protruding beyond it. You can see hanging around the neck other pieces of hollowed bone, very similar to that chime that you saw being described by Caleb.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it a troll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It appears to be trollish in nature. The pustules and part of its body, there's this thick green liquid that's oozing out in places. It's sitting there clinging to the rock with its long fingers, clutching it, looking over in the direction of where you were, breathing heavy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does he see The Mighty Nein?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems to be looking in the direction where you were.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But he doesn't see me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He doesn't see you at the moment, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispering) Do not see me!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How far away am I from him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're about 35 feet from it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Could I theoretically throw something behind him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could certainly try.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, sure. I'm going to take out a handful of ball bearings and try and toss them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a sleight of hand check to do so without making a very visible toss.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, right? No sound at all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take the handful and lob them quietly, as far as you can. You hear very faint impacts of them about 25, 30 feet off. The trollish creature goes (snarling) and pushes off the rock a bit, looking that direction. Looks over the rock, looks back in that direction. It's now looking like he's paranoid and keeping tabs on both sides.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to stealth back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another stealth check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage pull back to the rest of the group as you guys are holding your line, waiting for Beau to return.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a troll. Like a--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Toucan? With a belly?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's got a beak?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. He's like a troll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (loudly) What are you saying, Beau?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shh, Jester!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think he knows we're here. But he's a slimy undead troll-like guy.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: That sounds really bad. Let's not go near it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I also think he might be who lives in that hut.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do you know that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because he looked bony.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: That's a reasonable deduction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (loudly) Maybe there's lots of them around too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shut up, Jester.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Theater whisper.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think we want to deal with them, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll keep moving around the edge of the lake. Who wants to keep an eye on his area as we're moving?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think he's stalking us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I will.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester and Molly, you keep an eye as we keep moving forward. We'll come back to where the casters are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you going to stay behind?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, they're going to stay with us in a tight group. But they're going to keep their eyes as we move.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: It's all right, little Bren, they'll look after us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who? Oh me, yes! Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mind your slice of the pie, all right, you guys? You're a fan of pie, so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Fjord) "You're a fan of pie." (chirping)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am a fan of pie, Kiri!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you guys continue onward?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stealthy, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We are keeping an eye on the troll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are out in the open, at the edge of where the lake is, beyond the treeline. Being stealthy here means being quiet, but you're still very much out in the open.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So you're saying there's a chance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm saying if an entity knows you're there, if you're not trying to obscure your visual, you're going to have a hard time avoiding it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we create a distraction for it first?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're just not going to let it escape. We're just going to keep an eye out for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It might be better if we move quicker through here as well, instead of stealthily.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I'm sure if you pray to the Platinum Dragon, we'll be all right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (inaudible chanting)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys push on, Febron's looking extremely nervous now that you've mentioned this creature. "Wait, are you saying you saw this troll thing? Over there?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Heard of something like that around here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Only heard rumors and we talk about various things that live out there, trolls is definitely "one of them."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How long have you lived here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Through the ages, there have been all sorts of stories. There's uglier trolls here. Swamp "trolls, mountain trolls, all types, and this one, it wouldn't surprise me. I haven't seen one, but I "stay perfectly quiet. Quieter than you usually do as a group. I'm just going to stay here," and clings behind you, Fjord, like as a shield.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I don't know if that's going to work for me. All right, let's get moving. Try and ignore this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys move on, taking care to be quiet, but not out of sight. If you want to be stealthy in that regard, make a stealth check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll give him a chance whether he engages or not

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We wanted to move faster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So then no stealth?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No stealth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys continue pushing forward at your regular pace.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe a little faster than our regular, too.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: That was really brave, by the way, you sneaking off like that and finding it out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you. You're so complimentary. It makes me a little nauseous.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I was raised and people were really nice to me, they used to tell me I was special and how important I was and it made me feel nice, so I try and do that for everyone else.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man, that's so sweet. Ugh. Where are you from?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Thank you! Technically I was born in Port Damali, but I didn't spend a lot of time there. I lived on the streets on my own and then I was taken in by some people.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Some people?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Yeah, I guess-- You guys have been nice to me, I can tell. You know I mentioned those folks in the dragon masks, the cult? They were the ones that raised me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the first time you're introducing the word "cult" into conversation.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Oh, sorry, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're a cultist?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: No. I was raised by them--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're an ex-cultist.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cult adjacent.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I guess. I mean--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cult-ish?

lines.name: MARIK
lines.text: Cult-ish, maybe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Nott) "You're a cultist? You're a cultist?"

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: All right, stop, bird! Stop saying that word! I don't like it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did you have your own mask or do they just wear masks, out of curiosity?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I didn't get a mask because I wasn't allowed out. They kept me in the temple. It's because they were bad, all right? I'm glad that I'm not with them anymore. They're bad people.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So they did this to you?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: No, I've always been like this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They worshiped you?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Yeah, they told me I was special. I was important to them somehow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha and Fjord, as they're having this conversation, you're watching at the flanks and you can see the shape of that troll creature is still moving from tree to tree, keeping pace with your movement.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I saw it. What do you want to do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: There's one of him and however the fuck many of us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far back is he?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not too far.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not approaching you, but it's keeping pace.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're on rough terrain right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not in the center of the swamp where it's a lot of shifting topography and roots and vines and patches of deep water you have to come across. You're along the coast of this lake, so it's mainly soggy dirt and sand, so it's not rough terrain where you are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But where he is, it would be considered rough terrain?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. But you also have no protection. You're literally out in the open.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can try to send someone ahead as bait, lure him out, fight him on steady ground?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or we could just keep letting him match.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The thing is, what if something bad comes in front of us and then they trap us? Because he's just following us.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Why isn't he attacking us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe he has friends ahead that he's waiting on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I tend to find things that live in trees filled with bones tend to not have necessarily many friends. I'm just putting it out there. I have nothing else to base that off of, but it didn't look like a very social creature.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So if we feel like we want to get into a scrap, I or probably our new friend here could kick it off from a ways away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We could, or Jester, you're pretty friendly. You want to see if--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a friend?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The troll.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He had green pus-y ooze pouring out of holes in his face. Just want to throw that out there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You could heal him and curry favor with him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could if I made myself look like a little teeny troll. And they would want to be friends with me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I got undead vibes from this guy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, you are very charming, but every book that I have ever read about trolls-- They do not make friends. They are bitter, nasty things.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: They eat you if you're little, you know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He definitely had like a collarbone just hanging out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I see him from here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I technically have advantage because it's trying to perceive an undead creature?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because you don't know if this creature's undead or not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if we set a trap or an ambush for him or her?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I literally just said.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could do a little circley-poo and put Cali in the middle as bait, and then when it comes to attack, we spring the trap!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's the trap made of?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, I've been drinking a lot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we ran rope between a couple trees and then we tripped it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's watching us right now, isn't it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He probably is hearing everything we're talking about.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Debatable whether it can understand us, but perhaps it can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Man, trolls are so cool!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, how about this: Yasha, I'm sure you'll agree, we can make one move to see if it's interested in non-violence and then we have the advantage here now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I like that idea a lot. Yeah, I would agree.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't like being tailed in particular.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Someone walks up to it while the others flank around?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want me to do it, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here, you hold Kiri then, because I don't want her to get too close to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chirping)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you doing? Why are you holding--?

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: No! Put her down!

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: You wouldn't hold your own daughter that way!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Nott) "It's me, Bren!" (chirping) Pulls the dagger out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take Kiri, give me Kiri. Come here, little Kiri. My father won't hurt you anymore.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I'm going to stand closer to Bren. I'm disappointed in you, Mr. Fjord!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That means literally nothing to me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll flank to the north.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is the troll just watching all of you go away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you're doing this stealthily, then I need anyone who's trying to not be seen to make a stealth check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I try to Pass Without a Trace, you guys?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't think we should stealth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not an ambush if they can see where we are.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck the ambush. There's nine of us. One of him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That you know of.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would, in fact, like to try to walk behind a tree so I'm obscured.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to stealth to the north.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll join you in the non-stealthing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau's stealthing to the north, which will be here. Fjord, you guys are heading inward.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Molly, Yasha, and I will not be stealthing and heading inward, and we'll be just behind Jester's diplomatic envoy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know if it can see me or not, but I would like to hold Magic Missile in case it attacks my friends.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I want to be close enough to Jester in case anything happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, where are you standing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess I will be falling back because I'm going to talk to him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You'll be going in front of us. Because you're going to talk to him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought the thing was behind us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are heading northward this way. You guys have to go this way because the lake's all this direction.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I'm stood next to Nott, with Kiri.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott and Kiri are back here, and that would be-- Go off to that side. Febron is like, "I'm "going to stay back here with the people in the back-back, because I want to stay in the back."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sarcastically) Oh no, I was enjoying our closeness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys begin to trudge in, deeper into the swamp.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to pull the last of my pastries, which I'm sure are really fucking gross by now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they're pretty stale. You're fine. As you begin to move into the swamp, you do see the shape and it's about maybe 60 or so feet from where you are. You watch it shift, and then shift to another tree a little further away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's moving away from us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's moving away from you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we sure it's the same one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see one shape move, it's similar to the one you saw before. You can ascertain that it probably is the same creature, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, we do not want to follow this bunny rabbit down the hole.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to Invoke Duplicity and I'm going to send my duplicate towards the troll. It's skipping.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing Peter's Theme from Peter and the Wolf)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, perfect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check. No, you don't need to after that, we'll see if he can see through the illusion. It skips ahead. Just keeps walking in that direction?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Towards the trees, looking like she's picking some vegetation. I doubt there's flowers.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mushrooms.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But whatever. Yeah. Whatever she can do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 50 feet, 60 feet, gets relatively close to where you saw the shape vanish.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to have her turn her back to the troll and act like she's digging around in the mud.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From behind the tree, one of the claws-- The long, stringy hair dangling, somewhat stuck to its neck, shifting with the light breeze that blows through as it looks back and watches the illusion turn and shift. Is it relatively close to the tree, the illusion?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pretty close.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It sits there and waits, shifts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to have her take a couple of steps away from the tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It shifts back in its space a little bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's going to step back towards the tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as it gets within about five or so feet, the illusion, the troll creature reaches out and swings out to grab the illusion, passes through, and the claws (slash) into the tree. It goes (frantic grunting) and then vanishes behind the tree. You watch it dart, the shadow of it vanish behind another tree, and it's moving further away from where you are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't think it was friendly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Question answered. Did it move away?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want to chase it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we should stick to the safe house, what do you guys think?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think that's a good call.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll stagger back towards the back line of our group.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, continue on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll keep the invoke duplicity, the second me, skipping through the swamp at a distance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How long does that last? Lasts for a minute?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Invoke Duplicity lasts I think a minute, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys cluster together outside of the swamp alongside the curvature of the lake, keeping an eye on the side, you continue to travel forward. The lake slowly begins to, as you guys are heading northward, along its side it begins to curve to a northeastern direction, and Febron's like, "All right, so this is good. We're getting closer to the northern side of the lake, which "means we're getting close to where we follow the pearl blades to the safe house. Good, okay." At this point, you look over to the side. Who's keeping a watch on this? Okay, both of you guys roll a perception check, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Motherfucker, my perception is balls.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Beau needs to stop looking out for things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15, you said? You do see the shape now keeping pace with you again, same distance out there. It's stalking you, but it's definitely-- you get the sense, based on the interaction you had earlier and the distance it's keeping-- it's not interested in fighting nine of you. It's waiting to pick one of you off and take it wherever it's going to take it. It's smart enough to know that it's not going to jump into a fray in the open space, but it's definitely waiting to see what weaker one stays to the back.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Bren, get in the middle. Kiri.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep, on my way.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to get in the back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys continue heading in a northeastern direction until eventually you watch the lake come to a northern peak and begin to curve back into a southern area. It looks like the top of the lake bends to a point northward and then begins to head southward and level out. At this point, Febron goes, "All right, good. From here, we head northward into the swamp. We're looking for "daggers with pearl hilts in the trees. Those are the markers; there's six of them that lead us "there." He's going to make a perception check. He looks a bit lost; someone want to help him out with this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'll look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 12, I think. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes you a moment, but you manage to catch-- the third or fourth tree into the treeline, and you see a gleaming pearl-hilted dagger that is jammed about five feet off the ground into one of the thicker pieces of tree bark on the exterior of one of these trees. It's this little mark that looks like someone jammed a whittling knife into it and left it there, and he goes, "That's one, good. Okay, that means we're going the right way."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you see it? Show me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's right here; it's at eye level with me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Moving up, looking for the next one. Go ahead and roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, that's better. That's a 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you go, "There!" at the same time.

lines.name: MATT, LAURA
lines.text: Ah! (chuckling)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, second one." Moving on, looking for the third.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was a one for me, I don't see it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one takes a little longer to find. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I don't wander too far from everyone else because there's a troll out there, you guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You find the third, Febron finds the fourth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I find that last one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fifth one because he did not find it, but you locate it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His jaw hangs open, his expression this horrible, ghastly grimace. A few feet from him, stuck to one of the trees, you see a halfling woman with two blades jammed through her shoulders, pinning her up, legs dangling, but one leg is partially torn off. Her head is mounted down, hair in her face so you can't make out any features, and they're both placed up there right against this opening to a small clearing ahead, and this is where Febron goes, "And that's what I'm talking about. That's the warning. Whoever did this is trying to keep us out."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You haven't gone past these--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fuck no!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shh! (quietly) They could be around! Hey you guys, I could try this thing that I've been wanting to do for a while, which is where I can talk to somebody that is not alive anymore.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can do that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, the Traveler's teaching me all about it and I think I can do it.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Is the Traveler another wizard?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He kind of is, but he's really powerful, and he's super cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Settle in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He wears this really cool cloak, and he's got an amazing voice. Actually, hold on! I pull out one of my pamphlets. Here, if you want to learn more, you just let me know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe we can get back to talking to the dead people?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, do you want me to try it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That sounds like a great idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nott, why don't we check for traps, too?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's my job!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How long does it take you to talk to dead people?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's instantaneous, but I can talk to them for about ten minutes or so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anyone who's dead, or just one dead person?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just one dead person that I cast it on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which body is fresher, Matthew?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you're looking at, they're both about as fresh as the other.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which one's got the better mouth?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It doesn't have to be fresh, it could be really old.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both have their jaws intact. From what you can tell, the female halfling, you can't make out the features of the face because the hair is in the way and dangling. The other one's is open.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which one looks friendlier?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both look pretty dead!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let me check for traps on the smaller one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, a lot. 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No traps, nothing like that. You do notice there are wounds across the body. Beyond the leg missing, there are a number of wounds. You can make a medicine check to try and ascertain what they are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is one large puncture wound about that wide that's right around where the sternum is. But whatever punctured it, one of the edges is torn out, like something hooked was placed in and then pulled through, dragging the flesh with it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does her face look like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Intact.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we don't know this person, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you do not recognize this person, lifeless. You do see some rough elements of tattoos along the neck similar to the banded neck tattoos of members of The Gentleman's crew that you had seen before. Not as thick and dense, but you can see that there is a pattern to the acquisition of some of these tattoos for the ones who run the smuggling line. You're starting to ascertain and put that together, but intact.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would you like to talk to this one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, let me introduce you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is my friend, Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jester, this is a dead body.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm nervous; I've never done this before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This should be good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to hold my symbol of the Traveler.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to keep a lookout while she does this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to be like, okay, I'm going to do this thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just be confident.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kiri pulls a blade and gets behind Cali and is like, (like Jester) "I've never done this before."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kiri, be careful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Jester) "Be careful."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (tongue waggling) (surprised yell) (screaming)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as a tiny dagger goes into the tree next to it and Kiri's around Cali's going--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Easy, Kiri, easy. Settle, settle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cawing, whimpering)

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Yeah, Kiri settle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the chest breathes in, some of the air escapes some of the wounds, and there's bits of matter-

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: (retching)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The head settles down and looks right--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yasha and her gag reflex.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh no, it's happening again. It feels like it's coming up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Febron leaps back, he's like, "Shit!", and backs up a little bit. He looks really uncomfortable with this whole thing. You don't think he was prepared for any sort of dead-raising circumstance. "Is this fucking necromancy?!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, kind of!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (inhaling)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (low monotone) What did this to you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think you have to talk like you're dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really, are you sure though? Have you ever talked to a dead person?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've never done it, you know more about this than me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whispered voice) "Swamp fishmen from under the ground."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Beau, are you writing this down?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Swamp fishman from underground.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many swamp fishmen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Many."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Many, there're lots of them. There're lots of them that attacked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where? When?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long ago did this happen to you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many questions do you get?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get five of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Weeks. Two, maybe three."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow. Two or three weeks ago. Oh! Did anything that you did to the fishmen seem to hurt them more than other things?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (spookily) Ooh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We cut when we could. They bleed, but too many."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They bleed, but there's too many bleeds.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: If it bleeds, we can kill them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So when you cut it, it bleeds. Got it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One more question.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get one more question, what should I ask?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kiri comes up and grabs the dagger, wedges it out of the tree and turns to Cali and goes, (like Cali) "If it bleeds, we can kill it." Points it back to the corpse.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have another question.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Either where this happened or where they were hiding?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where did it happen, inside? Or where did they come from?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Underground.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But did they come from the house, or from outside the safe house, or inside?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Could you word it in a way where you ask all of those in one question, like, "Did you come from this, this, or this?" maybe, and then we'll know where?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or, we could ask if there's a secret entrance to the safe house.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What if there isn't?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then we've wasted a question.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: But we know there's not a secret entrance.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did any of it precede the attack?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or we could ask it what its childhood was like.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That would be an interesting story. I'm going to check behind us and see how far back Fermaw, what's his name, Febron?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Febron?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far back has Febron gone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's 20 feet behind you. He's keeping a little back from the whole undead thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, Febron! Don't go too far. There's a troll back there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, from behind one of the trees (growling), the troll reaches out and grabs him by the torso, pulls him back, and you hear him scream as the troll grabs him, tucks him under his arm, (snarling) and begins leaping away from you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Magic Missile!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it. Make an attack.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I go running.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go running.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I miss. I got a nine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Almost made a bet if Febron was going to make it.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Acid Splash. Cali's going to spit a glob of acid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (splashes) All righty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no. Wait. Come back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to cast at 2nd-level.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Oh no, man, oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me get the--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, did we already give him the 100 gold?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We're going to give him at the end, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we gave it to him already.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We gave him half?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We know where that money's going.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He did his job, though. He got us here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to go find it in the tree later. It'll be fine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If he dies, we can get the money back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't waste all your spells, you've got to fight fish men!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's practically going to be in a safety deposit box.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hold this for us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's fucking huge!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is the troll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought he was humanoid-sized!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, he's huge!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, he tucked Febron under his arm.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why did you go try to be friends with that? What are you thinking?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I didn't know he was that big!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is the opening of the clearing here, where you guys were talking to the halfling that was stapled to the tree right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just stapled to the tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essentially, yeah. You guys all spin and watch this happening. Kiri's over by the edge of the tree with you, and Caleb, where were you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Towards the back of the group, never near the front.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would have probably been over here, near Nott.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is north, towards me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, this would be north.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Technically!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, that area's north.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I fired a shot that missed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. What did you roll?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That did miss.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Magic Missile, level two, four darts, total of 16 force damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Reflex save-- Dexterity. Dexterity saving throw for the Acid Splash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The troll spins and goes running with Febron going (screaming) in its grasp, it starts lumbering, leaping from tree to tree. Its legs, while it has this bulbous, swollen midsection, these thin frog-like legs are giving these fairly decent leaps from section to section, its other arm grasping onto the trees as it runs. You can see this is definitely its home terrain. As these magic missiles swarm out and slam into its body, with each impact, that green ichor sprays across Febron, and it starts to burn into his skin. He's (screaming).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Xenomorph blood.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is he unconscious? Is he done? Is that it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I rolled 2d8. I rolled eight on each of them. That was the reaction there.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Dexterity saving throw for the Acid Splash as well, if you don't mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. That's a four.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven points of acid, got it. As it slams, it begins to burn the back of the skin. You watch a bit of steam rise off of its shoulder. It definitely is wounding the creature. This large, swollen troll is still making a break. I need everyone to roll initiative now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't fuck me, Matt Mercer.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a natural one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Actually, I'm going to blow my d8. Ooh, that's an eight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester and Cali?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott and Molly. 15 to ten?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 14 as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you speak up yet?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Of course you didn't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten to five?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Six. Every time!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's magic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ashley, it's incredible.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It really is. I have a plus two in this campaign, also. Good grief.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is that everybody? I think so, yeah. Top of the round, as it's bounding behind with an unconscious guide under its arm, Jester, you're up first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to Toll the Dead because he's been injured.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to turn around and be like (splat).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What type of damage is it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is necrotic damage, but he has to roll a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which he does not make, he rolled a 12.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So 2d12! I can help search for those in a second--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I got them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Six whole points!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six points of damage. As the energy coalesces and the bell, (impact) in the range of this creature, it impacts it and it staggers for a second, and the pustules on its body emit more of that poison.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He has a loud ringing in his ears, damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes your go. Cali, you're up.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Okay, so, seeing everything go on, and the combat erupt, you see her twitch a little bit, and she snarls a little. I'm going to rush up 30 feet, move up as much as I can. Get back here, now! I'm going to Quickened Spell, False Life on myself-- actually, no, I'll just do it as a normal action, I won't Quickened Spell it. I'll do False Life on myself and gain some vigor, as a 1st-level spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All words I've never heard before.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Same!

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I gain seven temporary hit points, and then I'm going to-- well, that's it. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cool. This strange barrier of arcane energy forms around Cali's body, giving this little essence of vigor, and the body swells a bit. That finishes your turn. Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll get within 30 feet. Fire a crossbow shot towards its foot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Within 30 feet, you can stop about there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It hits, probably. 24?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sneak attack? No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, no, because he's aware that you were there, and is not currently flanked by any allies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not flanked by Febron.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, terrible. Five points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five points of piercing damage. It strikes and sticks into the back, and more of that green stuff begins to spray out of the wound where it hit in the vicinity. It's creating bursts of this toxic sludge that's oozing from its body around it each time you're hitting it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll shoot again, with bonus action. Ooh, that's not as good. 13?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13? That does not hit. It manages to hit the tree that's near it and sticking into that one, there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll use the rest of my movement to duck behind a tree or something while I scream.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wonder if Febron is going to get covered in that pus that's coming out of him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's quite a bit of it on Febron, actually.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we in difficult terrain here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Green stuff should sponsor us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say in this clearing you're not in terribly difficult terrain. You're moving around okay, it's not too bad. The further you get into it this way, it starts getting a little more-- like in the cluster of trees in here, it starts getting a harder to move in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Although, you've got your shoes on, yeah?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The ring.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Nott's turn. Molly, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and cast Enthrall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That is a 14. What is it, wisdom?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know. Yes, I believe it's a wisdom--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. Your DC on that is? It's charisma-based, right? This is your racial?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it is racial.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It succeeds, it's a ten. Unfortunately! That would have stopped it in its tracks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (groaning mumbles)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was Molly?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is that your turn? Do you want to move closer?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll move up to that tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you move up to there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As a bonus, I'll-- no, I'll hold off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that finishes Molly's go. Beau and Fjord, you guys are up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think I'm 40 feet within him. If you do it--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're 40 feet within him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) You do, you get right up into its body.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: First two strikes! First one is a 21, second one is a 16?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay! Damn it, I rolled a one, this sucks. 12 damage for the first one, seven damage for the second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What else are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to use a ki point to do stunning strike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, nice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stunning strike!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. 21.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a plus five on its constitution saving throw. Trolls, man. It resists the stunning strike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's good to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have your bonus, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I still have my bonus. I'll just punch him in the face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Please don't waste all your stuff on this guy, because, you know--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because we might still fight all those things. Nine damage. No, sorry, ten damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten damage. Third strike?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, cool. You rush forward, slamming into it with your staff and your fists, striking into its body. With each impact, it takes you a moment to realize what's happening, but that spray is covering your face, and as it does, the venom is pushing into your flesh and burning upon contact.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys, it makes your throat a little numb!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take nine points of poison damage. You take another nine points of poison damage. You take 15 points of poison damage. A total of-- sorry, 15, nine and nine, so that's 34? 34 points of poison damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 33, sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Y'all, don't get close to this guy, because I don't want to waste all my--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Febron, by the way? Fucking dead. You see now he's coated in this toxin. The eyes are open and now pouring out of his mouth is foam at the edge with his tongue lolling out. Yeah, as it was fleeing, all the impacts covered him with the same toxic stuff and sent him straight to his grave.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Guys, our money's getting away!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it's okay because I'm going to have to use all my fucking spells healing you, Beau!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm okay!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why don't you get back here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Beau's turn. Fjord, what are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I move 15 feet towards the troll? I'll see the gore and poison splattering all over Beau and little sizzles coming up and shit, and I'm like: Eh, Eldritch Blast!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn around to you and I go (gasping and groaning).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (screams, blasts)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Two attacks on it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Oh, that's 26 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And 25 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Those were monsters, jeez. 1d10 plus four, that's eight points on the first one, and that's 14 points on the second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit, right!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take five points of poison damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on, let me make sure I'm doing my math right, too. It was 33 points of damage is what you did before, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was 15 plus 18, so it's 33.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, and then--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just took another 20 points of poison damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am unconscious.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?! Way to go, Mee-ster Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, don't anybody else hit it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, please don't pick up Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau falls onto the ground, arms limp, covered in this toxic substance. That ends your turn, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing)

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I cast Major Regret at 5th-level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so it is now the troll's turn. The troll does not regenerate because you did acid damage to it with your last attack, which prevents it from regaining any hit points.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: That was not me meta-gaming, chat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, it's still currently clutching the body of Febron under its arm. It's going for a straight bolt, it looks down and sees Beau unconscious, uses its action to pick Beau up under the other arm--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! Goddamn it.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: It doesn't have to move to do it, does it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. Now it's going to use its full movement. That's 30, it is right where the marker is right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: --without killing Beau, because we can't attack it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have to stop it with magic, or nets.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anyone have a Hold Monster situation?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, this is a pickle, guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You didn't really like that character that much, did you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends the troll's turn. Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Haven't even gotten her backstory yet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will use my movement first. I want to get as close as I can, which is 15 feet-- or, no, you said the closer we get?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there is when you start getting to rough terrain, so that's as far as you get-- which the troll is not affected by, you've noticed that it's in its home turf.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you know, I went through a whole range of emotions because first I was going to try to hold it, but then the guy was dead, so I was like fuck it, I'll switch to a Fire Bolt, but then he grabbed Beau, so I am going to use the Glove of Blasting and cast Scorching Ray on it, because I can't reach for anything better.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but what if it makes it pus its thing and then it hits Beau and she dies?!

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Every time it gets hit, even by spells.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't damage it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's what happened to Febron.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We need like a hold thing--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't have that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't either. I mean, I got something that holds, but it damages, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing, Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to cast Magic Missile on its head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Magic Missile on its head?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and roll for the damage on that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Beau dies.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I'm going to cast-- fucksticks. I'm going to cast Haste on Nott. That's what I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You are now holding concentration on Haste. Nott, you feel suddenly the world slows ever so slightly and you feel this burst of adrenaline in your body.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have a healing potion?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. How close can I get?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man, I was hoping to stun it, guys, I'm sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was a good plan.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fuck, that's not going to work.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Your AC is up, an extra action.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, well, I would like to rage. I'm going to scream out, in a super intimidating voice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't forget, if you rage and don't attack or are attacked by the end of your next turn, you lose your rage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So if you're not planning to attack it, or if there's not going to be something attacking you, you're losing a rage for the day, so keep that in mind.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: You just need to take damage, like get hit by something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's either attack or be attacked, you don't have to take damage necessarily.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The acid will do full damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pus flew out of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sweating.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh my god, you're amazing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, audience.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it's taking damage. So it's you attacking or taking damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, fuck. Shit. Okay. Well, I'm not going to take it back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you just grapple it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's as far as I can go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Unfortunately, you're starting to get through some sludge.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can dash and burn your action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I'll do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys know where he's taking me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Potentially.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as close as you can get right there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Am I within ten feet of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Can I use necrotic shroud, then, if I use that as the action to run?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have an action to use it anymore, unfortunately.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Can I just yell at it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. What do you yell? I give you two bonus actions.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Super intimidating. Oh, but then I've got to fucking attack something. All right, I'm going to be super intimidating and say: Drop it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: No! I said no!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roll a 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 20! Oh, so close!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, that's intimidation. Intimidation is minus two.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I look so mean because my charisma's so low.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it's charisma-based, but depending on the intimidation, you can use your strength modifier instead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, with your strength modifier?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, without the strength modifier.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can use your str--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh I can use my strength!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It makes sense, and it's how we did it in the last campaign, too. It's one of the rules that they say you can use for your campaign. Charisma or strength for your intimidation because it makes sense for you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh yes, okay! Okay, okay, okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: My favorite Pike line, by the way, in Pillars Of Eternity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was just thinking that as well!

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay! 22!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22, all right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I died when I heard that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, it turns around and glances at you and it looks shaken. I'll say, for the purposes of this, it's frightened of you until the end of your next turn.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's going to keep running away from you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's all happening like this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does that finish your turn, Yasha?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I like slap myself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Does that not work? Shit. Wasted a rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's now Kiri's turn. Kiri holding a dagger--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kiri be my savior!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aw Kiri.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She just holds the dagger. That's Kiri's turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, Kiri.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And shouts, (like Jester) "Fuck!" Jester, it's your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I get within 60 feet of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're within 60 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Awesome! I'm going to cast Healing Word on Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh shit. Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As my bonus action. Healing Word, so you regain 1d4 plus four hit points.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seven points!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you are conscious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh! I'm conscious!

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Being grappled by a troll, one thing at a time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seven hit points, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Modern Literature!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Lie down, play dead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't know what that is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to wake up, see my situation and go (gasps) and play dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so when we come to your turn, you can do that. You come to consciousness, and you're like (panting) and your body hurts, there's all this stinging from the toxin burning your skin and flesh. You're chucked under and you can feel the claws digging into part of your thigh and side as you're being run along by this giant troll creature. It smells awful; this heavy scent of rotting citrus and fungus that's permeating from its body. That finishes your turn, Jester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was my bonus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was your bonus, you still have your action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I don't think I can do anything. I guess I'll hold an attack, I'll hold--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sacred Flame?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'll hold Sacred Flame until Beau is dropped and far enough away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. Holding there, Cali, you're up.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: How close can I get to it with the difficult terrain? Can I get next to Yasha?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get that close right now with the speed of 30 feet, yeah.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: No, it's fine. I will get there and she twitches a little bit. Come on! Quickened Levitate on Beau. I'm going to try and lift Beau up. If there's a tree line above, I'm going to try and fling her up to the tree line.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Interesting! For the purposes of this, make an arcana check and this is going to be your attempt to break the grapple of the troll.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, Cali!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten. Not very good at arcana.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two! Fucking! You're a lucky son of a bitch! It has a plus four on its strength roll.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: So (whoop).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Calianna!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ripping from the grip of the troll, Beau gets lifted into the air, and is now hovering there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is she far enough away?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Is there a tree line that I can send her to so she can grab on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You can do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Grab on!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Woo!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When she is far enough away, I cast Sacred Flame.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: For my action, I'm going to do another Acid Splash because that was a bonus because of quickened.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau is now lifted up into the tree. You're just within reach of branches when it comes to your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, everything's fine now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean she's half melted, but...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to be honest, you almost killed her, man. Scorching Ray if those all had hit, Beau's dead. I was like, oh fuck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We got to cut that dead weight, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I got real nervous. Magic Missile would have done the same, too, because it's a splash per missile.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have blackmail material on you, motherfucker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Dex save for you. Natural 20, and then for you dex save as well. That is an eight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so you get hit with 2d8.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nine points!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Splashes out. No one is close enough to be impacted by the effect.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How's Febron?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Febron's dead. Febron's like--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A soggy KFC drumstick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of! His arms and legs are dangling behind as it's dragging him through. It's pretty rough.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does the radiant damage seem to have a particular effect?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not beyond anything else.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should just let him go, huh?

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Get out of here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ending Cali's turn; Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm up? Okay, is there anything in melee range with it? No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll move within 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's not quite within 30 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's as close as I can get?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nott is double speed and has a ring on for water walking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For water walking, right. I'll say, for that purpose, it does give you the extra movement there. So now you're just within 30 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're not winners, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wisdom save is a 13. What's your DC?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14, it fails! It immediately falls prone, laughing with the corpse of Febron being flailed about in the air as it's spinning. The legs and arms--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll use my extra action to attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well technically, you can only do the bonus action to attack if you use the attack action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is an extra attack action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh! Because you're hasted! That's right! Sorry, I was thinking of the bonus action, you're correct.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I rolled a 16 plus seven, 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because it's prone do I get advantage or anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, you get disadvantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, natural 20, so it still hits, 23. But do I get sneak attack? No. Because it's prone, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because you do not have advantage on the attack, unfortunately.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, look. it's a ten to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean ten points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It sinks into it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't get a bonus action off of that attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do because it's an attack action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'll fire again. Natural 20 and a 20, just a straight 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that hits. To two? Oh man, that sucks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Another seven points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven points of damage. That finishes your turn, Nott, well done. On the ground you're firing both of those. They're sticking inside, these sprays of poison toxin out of his body as it's laughing on the ground. For Tasha's Hideous laughter, does it get a chance to break?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let me see, at the end of each of its turns or each time it takes damage, a target can make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope, that was a two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Target has advantage on that save if it's triggered by that damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The second roll was a 16, so it succeeds. It fell prone, gave you disadvantage on the attacks, and then got out of your spell. Lesson learned.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nice. Right, good to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it is prone. That finishes your turn, Nott. Molly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where is the little bird?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's really not much I can do here, so I'm going to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Send it packing, Molly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got nothing I can do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then get the fuck out of here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (Infernal voice) Get the fuck out of here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I can do that, I'm going to do one more attempt to do a Devil's Tongue.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What does it sound like?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (demonic) Scoot, scoot! Scoot!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes what type of psychic damage?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, wow, holy cow. I'm not used to it working. 5th-level, so hey, look at that, it actually has gone up. 2d4 psychic damage. That's four points of damage and it has disadvantage on its next attack roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Interesting, okay, so psychic damage strikes it and it does not spray the venomous toxin upon receiving the psychic damage. But it is grabbing its head, now the laughter has subsided.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Brain freeze.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's trying to get back to its feet. That finishes your turn, Molly?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's all I got.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, you're up in the trees. Fjord, you're on the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're levitating.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am levitating.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you try and hold on to the branch?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, can I scootch and perch up on the branch?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, you still have the levitation spell on you, so if you were to leap, you'd just glide.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Marry Poppins!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I grip the tree branch with my thighs, I'm going to force grip it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're on the branch there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, side saddle and then I'm going to-- I don't know why I'm acting like I'm drawing a bow like I'm a bow user because I've never been a bow user, but my name is Beau. I'm going to take two shurikens and do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hadouken!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: First attack, don't fuck me Gil, 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 just hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When it is prone you have disadvantage, so roll again to attack. It's a ranged attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh wow, that's 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 just misses. It sinks into the swamp mud next to it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bummer, second one, natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One more time because this has disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so that does hit, roll damage on the second one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which is a d4 we've said, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, cocked. Super cocked. More!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure, I'll take that. That's a ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four plus--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Four plus six, my attack bonus, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Damage bonus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My damage bonus. Oh I'm sorry, eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight, that's what I thought. Eight points of damage. The shuriken sinks into its chest; another spray of toxin. Nothing in the vicinity to take the damage, that finish your turn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a bonus, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I can't do a range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's only unarmed. I think that's your turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Glug glug.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Glug glug?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't have a healing potion.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She doesn't have a glug glug.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll move five feet closer towards el troll, and I'll say: Get the fuck out of here! And I'll Eldritch Blast twice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Disadvantage on each strike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's going to miss anyway, and the second one. They both miss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both go passing right over its body as it's trying to get up. It slips for a second, and what would've hit, it ducks out of the way just in time and both of them arc off, hitting nothing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You get your ass out of this forest!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hurting, but you're watching its flesh stitch together a little more and starting to heal up from some of the wounds.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, get the fuck on out! Nobody wants you here, anyway!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is anybody pursuing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, it's in my range. I will walk 15 feet forward and cast Fire Bolt from here. It's a 120-foot range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and roll for that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh that's not the d20, hold on. That's a natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. The Fire Bolt vanishes beyond its space there. Anybody else with a ranged attack that wants to try and make it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, I'll take a shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At disadvantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this range it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 misses. It's starting to hit the mist and its form is starting to become a little harder to see and it's running with such an intense speed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got one more hasted action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. And a bonus action attack if you want to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Terrible. 14?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14? No, just misses.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, and a bonus attack action. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll damage. It does strike.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, that's one!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kill it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eight points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight points of damage. It manages to catch it. It's still running. Fjord, you're the only one with a proper ranged attack here if you want to try.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure, I'll do it. I'll take two more Eldritch Blasts at it. At disadvantage, right? That's a natural one. My bad. 19. 18! That'll hit, that's 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 1d10. That's nine plus four. 13 points of Eldritch Blast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's got our gold!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It gets blasted. Still going.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You fucking piece of shit!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How far away is he right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, now it takes its next turn to do a full 60-foot run.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I couldn't jump one more and try to get him a little--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think he's going down with it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, the fact that you guys are having a hard time hitting it and the rate that it's healing, you're starting to think--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, he's healing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't you dare tell us what we're starting to think!
