lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm just saying, you can continue to pursue if you want to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we'd be idiots.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: But the implication is: You really don't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We know where he lives!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's right. We know where his hovel is. So lesson learned.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, there's a dead person I'm talking to!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have one more question!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I turn around and run back to the dead person.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beau is just: You fucking--!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm doggy-paddling through the air.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Will you let our friend down?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Oh yeah, sorry Ms. Beau!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I slow fall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Still one more question.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matt, we're still in the middle of nowhere at this point, or we're--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are right at the edge of where these bodies have been propped up as a warning, which, from what Febron told you, was placed up to prevent people from coming towards the safe house.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't have our guide anymore. Ask this one which way to go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, this isn't the safe house?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is the gate of the safe house.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're starting to get close to it, as far as you know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As far as we know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If these are the warnings.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Specific directions.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. I guess that's what I'll ask it, then, because that's all I can ask.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you approach the head is tracking you the whole time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry, we got distracted, there was a troll that came and stole our guide. I think you might have known him. Anyway, which way is the actual safe house that we're trying to get to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The head curves off to the right between the tree that it's stapled to and the other body that's propped up. "100 feet that way."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit. We totally could have seen it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can see it, it's right there!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see any safe house. You don't see anything like that. At that point the head (sighs) continues back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, at least we know it's 100 feet, so we can search for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are there actual knives stuck in--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks to be two shortswords have been jammed into it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shortswords or daggers?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shortswords.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do they have anything in their pockets?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we're looting these bodies right now. That's nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Investigation, you say? 14?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Rummaging through the pockets and the various baubles you can find, you find four pieces of gold, a handful of about 12 silver-- this is on the halfling-- a charm, looks like it's made from a dried animal foot of some kind, like a dog or a coyote.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (hiccups)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (imitates a hiccup)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's cursed hiccups.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a note that's keeping track of locations, but it's mostly soaked now and the ink has all run, and you make out bits of words here and there, but it makes no sense to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm taking it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Give me the charm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you going to check if it's magic?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't check if it's magic.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Remember, we already figured this part out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the paper is now dry and a full piece of paper, but the ink is still as smeared and lost as it was before.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I look at the words?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of them says two hours past the noon sun, that's the most you make out of one sentence. Part of it's smeared. It's like Steve Martin in The Jerk trying to read the love letter. (gibberish) The other things you can make out are four men required, and then another one saying something about Shady-- and that's all you make out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shady grove. I bet the Shady grove.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shadycreek.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll say while Jester was doing all that, Caleb sat down and took out his spellbook and started ritual casting Detect Magic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, in fact, could we could take a short rest while Caleb's doing that since that was a little gnarlier than we anticipated?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, maybe after I do that because I'm tapped.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My body hurts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to heal you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (surfer voice) The_bowmeister, enjoy your Wyrmwood! (normal voice) So congratulations, we'll get that sent out to you ASAP.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's very Wildemount, the_bowmeister.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Back into the game we go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, now you got it on Mark!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ugh! (blood spraying)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll a d4.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fantastic Music. They did the track for the animated thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So good!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So good! I love it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (Scottish accent) I love it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Indeed. Bringing us back into the game. You guys have taken your short rest, healed up a bit, and recovered from the chaos of the swamp you managed to trudge through. You've lost your guide, but you've survived thus far. The rest of you, at least. What would you like to do? Oh, you were casting--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scorching Ray on Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Finish her off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Finish her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I trusted you, motherfucker.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I told you everything. You have to die!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Utilizing Detect Magic, you were saying--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, it's like blacklight, so on everything on what they were looking at.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing magical within what was found on the bodies, no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is Nott glowing in any kind of way that I am not used to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How far does that extend?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 30 feet, I believe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It occurred to me from what your friend said that this location might not be entirely above ground any longer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm-hmm. My dead friend? Yeah, I think it might be hidden or something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Two hours past, what was it, noon?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Two past noon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe it only becomes visible at a certain time?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Four men required.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You, my good friend, would you walk with me in the direction that the dead person said that this entrance is in? Before my magic runs out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why do you feel the need to call me a good friend?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're right. Person that I work with, would you walk over before my spell runs out so that I can use it to help the group?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why don't we all head in that direction, maybe? In a large, well knit group.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Since there are things that'll be snagging bitches when we get separated.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Is it dark, or is it--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, at this point it's later afternoon, maybe. It's like two or three o'clock.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe like, two past noon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb knows exactly what time it is. Liam likes to burn his friends.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caleb also likes to burn his friends.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (singing) One thing, we've got it coming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys continue on past the tree?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Towards the 100-foot mark that the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we scan for traps?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Probably.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Caleb's Detect Magic would probably pick up traces on my bracelet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So it glows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Outside of the space around you or the trinkets found within the corpses, nothing. But you do see the mild glow from the bracelet on Cali's arm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey Cali, can I ask you a question?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Sure, Jester!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On check traps, sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, go ahead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This bowl that we're looking for.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You said it was used in rituals.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I think it is, yeah. It's more that I know that it's part of a set that I know this cult were looking for and I want to stop them getting it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like a tea set?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Were you ever used in rituals with these bowls?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Kind of. Not ones involving this bowl. But other rituals. God, this sounds really horrible to say. They weren't nice people. They kill people and I kind of helped them because I didn't know any better. You got to remember, Serissa, the priestess who raised me, she told me all this stuff about the Tyrant, about the Queen, and I thought that that was just what the world was like, you know, I thought that that was good, and she told me that these other people were bad, and thieves, and that they were being killed for righteous purpose.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who were the bad people?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What queen?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: She's the Queen of Dragons. Five draconic heads represent her, and that kind of thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So not a real queen?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Maybe she's a real queen, I don't know. I just always heard to her referred to as the Queen.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: She has five heads?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: That's what the stories say. One for each color of dragon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would I know about this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a religion check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I know about re-- No. I don't know anything about religion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make a religion check if you want to try and recall information.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. You've heard of the Scaled Tyrant. You don't know a whole lot of information. But you know, through your research, that one of the entities that partook in elements of the Calamity.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Obviously not part of the okayed deities of the Empire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Not at all. Is definitely considered one of the betrayer gods in the Calamity, though very selfish and is considered by many to be the patron-- whether it be the mother of, or the patron of, chromatic dragons.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Serissa, the priestess who found me, she was nice to me, but she would torture and kill people in her name.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What kind of people?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: That's why I want to stop these bowls. I want to stop them doing this to other people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They are super evil bowls?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I don't think so. I think they're like magically minor, like a little bit magic, but as long as they're not used by the wrong people they should be fine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What do you plan to do with the bowl once you get it?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Destroy it if I can. Take it and hide it somewhere that they can't find it. They raised me, and I learned a lot, and I know what they're capable of and I feel responsible for the things I helped them do. So I feel like it's my responsibility to stop them.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How was the bowl used in the ritual?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: It's not one I was familiar with, but I just know that it's part of a set. There's six of them, I think. Different things that they all use.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you trying to look for all six of them?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: If I can, but they're hard to find. The cult works in shadows, they keep themselves really secretive. I wasn't allowed outside of our temple where I was raised. They gave me everything I wanted, but I wasn't allowed outside, so I guess I can be a bit naive about a few things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think being stuck inside makes you naive. I mean, I know some people that were stuck inside that know lots of things.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Really? I hope that I can meet them. I feel like I need to learn a lot more, you know? So many people treat me-- I ask if I can trust them, they say yes, and then they trick me. Or they use me to do bad things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's not okay.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I know, right!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's talking about herself.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cali, do you plan to go back to Port Damali after this if you're successful?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I've got a friend there, a legionnaire. He rescued me. He's a dwarf called Grim. I'm sure he'd help me find a secure place for the artifact. I don't know. Yeah. I guess I'll try and find somewhere to hide them and keep on trying to stop these guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Absolutely. Well, let's try our luck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It seems like a very large task for one person.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Their bodies covered with similar wounds as the ones you inspected before. Some are slumped against the base of the roots. Some are held up and vines wrapped around them and they are stapled at an angle onto the sides of the tree. They're all currently placed as a warning to either notify or fend off anyone who would wander too close.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think the fish people like the safe house being here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe they want the safe house for themselves?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe this tree is sacred and it was being used as a safe house and that's not okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Certainly not welcome.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would have been used as a safe house for awhile I imagine, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The tree is not giving off anything, no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cali, can you make this water around the tree go away?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Yeah, actually, I think I should be able to do something about that. I'll Shape Water and I can push it around in a five foot cube, so I can part it a little bit. Or I can turn it clear as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can part areas of it, but it's about 15 feet across, as far as the width of it and it changes in width depending on which place on the tree you head. It is, essentially, a waist-deep area of water. So you could move with it and--

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Can I shallow it and disperse it, so it still has water, but it shrink it down five feet so it's not as deep to walk through?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can bring it to just past knee height within a very localized area to you.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: That's about the best I can do Jester, I'm sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no, that's really impressive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel like Caleb could have done it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb, can you do that, too?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. I do not know how to do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He can't do it, Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's being modest. He could do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nott, I have limitations. I can do many things like you--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bren!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we try to go towards the tree? Towards all the dead bodies?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is the water around the tree in a circle, like it pans out from around the side?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of. There's a big clearing around this tree. It's natural for the most part, but it looks like this area is centered around the tree.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I see anything like landmarks or anything out of place surrounding the tree?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is the water up to our waist now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well no, you haven't submerged in the water yet. But it looks about waist high as you lower the water level.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's all right. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do glance up and see a band of teal fabric tied around one of the branches or the edges of the roots at the top part about ten feet up that has been weathered and dirtied from just being there for a long time. A lot of the color has faded. But you just barely pick out its location.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's just one little ribbon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like it might have been a bandana that was wrapped and tied around a root above.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to see if I can climb the tree and get to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you wade through the water.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go with her, just to accompany.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nott, do you want to walk on top of the water for a bit and keep an eye for anything underneath the surface?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, what if something grabs me from under the surface?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, what if something grabs you from the shore? Like a troll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or when, if someone grabs you from the shore.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll walk around.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Is Nott a nickname for Bren?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: That makes a lot more sense because you keep calling her Nott and I just didn't get it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sometimes we call her Nott Bren. Yeah.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Okay. I mean, sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We were drunk at the time, it just sort of happened.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's as small as a tree knot, you know, so-- cute.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Oh, well Nott, if I'm allowed to call you that--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I can make the water clear so that you can see if there's anything that could grab you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was that thing you said about honesty earlier? I can't remember.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't know any of the fact that I almost killed you, Marisha Ray.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm talking about before you almost killed me when you had that great quote about honesty earlier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, make an athletics check to try and climb the tree.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, what I was trying to do for us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Easiest to remember.

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: My wisdom is eight so I can't pick up on any of this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Athletics. To climb the tree.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Huh? Damn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes a while to even get close, but the general moisture in the air makes it slick and you keep slipping down the side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's up there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I have Fjord give me a boost?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's up there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can try. Roll--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's a teal piece of fabric that's tied up on a branch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A tiny piece of teal fabric tied--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight to ten feet up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll just reach it with my Mage Hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (popping noise) Do you untie it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an old, starched, weathered bandana.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why don't you try pulling on the branch that it was tied to?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How deep is the water without the water being dispersed? Near the base of the tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About three feet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The water is now crystal clear, by the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah, so now the water's clear and you can see below there's thick sediment, muck, a few bones of some wayward creature that long has been left to rot beneath the water but there's nothing living in there aside from toads, tadpoles, other small slithering natural creatures that call the swamp home.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I will lower it, now that I've seen it's clear, and I'll say: Well, I'm happy to step in first. You guys were kind enough to bring me, I'm happy to step through and make sure it's okay. I'll start.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you make your way through, catching up to Beau and Fjord who are at the base of the tree. You get up to the base of the tree now. The rest of you guys follow suit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all cross past the water path. You're now at the base of the tree. You, Nott, have the strange teal faded scarf now in your grasp.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's just a scarf?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nothing else has happened?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want me to pull on the branch?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pull on the branch that it was tied to.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, maybe it'll open something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll pull on that branch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh jeez.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vigorously pull on it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe there's two branches.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The gif machine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The gif machine, Sam Riegel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (strained yelling)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The portions of the tree here do not bend very much and it doesn't seem to react. The strength of the Mage Hand isn't very strong.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there any knots on the tree? Like underneath where the ribbon was?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What? Where did that even go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's right here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12? Yeah. You glance around and as you were placing your hands against part of it some of it shifts, it wobbles. Now getting a glance, there's a piece of weathered driftwood or separate wood that has been pressed up and tucked behind some of the roots to look like it's part of the tree. But it's a little bit of a different texture, a different type of wood and as you press on it, it wiggles. You shift it--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Traps!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Check for traps, Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Truly blessed with such wisdom.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will check for traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16. It does not appear to be trapped.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to move it then.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You wiggle it out, pull it free and now you can see about a four-foot carved hollow in the tree that leads to a dark, lightless interior.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You did it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, you and Beau and me did it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you did it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aww.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With my help.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nicely done. Who's first?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I almost died today, motherfuckers, I almost died.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you want to throw some light in here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was Caleb's fault.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was Caleb's fault, exactly, and I can't remember the thing he said about honesty and remembering.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb was on point.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I can go first and summon some light.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can do light?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, Caleb can do light too; it's not the greatest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, let's just hold on. I'll go in with darkvision without setting off any lights that might herald them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if there's traps on the inside, though?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Then I'll get hurt.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Matt, I'll cast Light still behind these guys, but it comes out of her draconic eye. She brushes her hair to the side and she has a yellow draconic eye on her left side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. It glows like a torchlight in the vicinity.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cali, you're so cool.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Thanks, Jester! You're so cute. I love it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you! I love you.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Aww!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you step inside, Fjord, you notice a fairly well-cleared interior that smells of marsh water and lamp oil. Glancing about, there are two hooks on the wall that have been jammed in that carry the top part of some sort of oil lantern that has been shattered against the wall. The glass itself is broken. The metal is bent and you now can see there's some soaked lamp oil that has fallen from those impacts that has hit the ground on the wall nearby and is offering that additional smell to the room. The floor is somewhat soggy with moss and bits of sand and gravel as well as the occasional heavy root that breaks through the surface of that soft floor. There are some pieces of broken wood slats, but besides that, the chamber appears to be empty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't see anything inside here. Looks like there was a broken lamp, so careful with fire.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: There's got to be more here, right? This can't be it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I'll push in a little bit more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The chamber's about 30 feet wide. It's just round.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Looking up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look up. The ceiling's about 12 feet tall and there's some hanging roots that are dangling from the top. It looks like it's been carved away maybe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it feel like it's bigger on the inside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It matches the size. It's probably about two feet to three feet of thickness of the actual tree trunk and the interior's hollow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I notice any furniture, articles, clothing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Make an investigation check if you want to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there any trap doors on the floor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. A couple things. Though you don't have a sense of color-- are you the only one in the chamber right now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I believe Cali.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I was behind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we're in there as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You went in there as well?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Yeah, to give them light.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. The rest of you guys step into the chamber and the light comes in. What you failed to see because it was a change of color becomes immediately apparent. There are scattered splashes of blood across areas of the walls inside. They're dried, but dried enough to the point where they haven't gone completely black and then disintegrated. So this is relatively recent, weeks maybe. As you guys are inspecting the space, there are certain gashes against-- it looks like there was definitely a fight and scuffle. The soft ground here has signs of turbulent movement as well as a number of smeared grooves in the ground that snake and spiral about.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are there any immediate threats in there, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not that I can see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, as you're glancing about answering this question, you look down on the far north corner of it and where some of the roots have gathered and come down, there's one space where you don't see the wall of the tree behind it. As you move the root out of the way, there is an actual hole about two and a half feet wide that descends below the tree.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not any danger in the chamber, but it looks like there's more to this room.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Does it look like they were dragging bodies down there? The blood streaks and stuff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could've been.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Do they lead there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, do the tracks lead to the hole?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are some spatters of blood and there are some things that give the sign of being pulled on as well as pieces and shards of wood, including bits of porcelain, some object that had shattered and broken. Looks like whatever may have been within this chamber at some point, a lot of it's been brought down there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott Bren, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got to go down there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. By yourself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's where the fish people live! Are there fish scales on the ground?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Do you need light?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That would help.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll help with this one. Smelling the air for fishy. Oh, doesn't matter anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do manage to pull through. You do see a small piece of thick scaled hide that was carved off, probably as part of a scuffle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fish skin!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty tough.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's tough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's salty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's kind of salty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tuna? Salmon?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Smells like fish.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Brackish flesh?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to put it in my bag.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Gross.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Before we go down or as these guys go down, can I take a lap and look at the bodies on the outside and see if I recognize any of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Recognize any of the bodies?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The six bodies.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Outside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Glancing past and taking a look; there's nobody that you've seen before that is amongst this crew. They all appear to be darkly dressed, generally to keep out of sight. You do see two of the members there that have an accumulation of neck tattoos. You've seen the ones back in Zadash that were almost full bands of designs. These individuals have only sections of it. You start getting the idea that the more they've worked with whatever organization that work this is, the more completion they've had of certain jobs depending on what the job is, a certain type of individual acquires tattoos as a sign of how long they've been there and how successful they've been.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's cool. Okay. So they all seem like smugglers?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At one point possibly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do a quick round of their pockets?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Investigation check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Just real quick!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With disadvantage, because it's quick.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: --and puts light up in the tree out there with her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm outside with her and I'm casting Dancing Lights into the trees so that she can see better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. You manage to scrape away about 17 gold pieces and five silver pieces.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before, as you pull off of it, you watch as the lower half of the body sloughs off the torso and you back away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The smell is awful, as a lot of the interior gas of the bloated corpse escapes into this terrible sulfurous stench.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Gross.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Please, we have been around death plenty of times. Caleb throws up quietly into the water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you go back and forth?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, only one place to go and that's down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait! I'm just going to take a quick minute to stare into the eternal abyss of the dodecahedron.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just open up the bag so you can see it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god what is in there?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't let Cali see it. Sorry, Cali.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You take a moment to focus and place your hand on this lightly thrumming device. Your vision is pulled into this universal space of stars and gas and distant existences you've never contemplated and there you see before you the pulsing light of possibility. You reach out a hand and grasp it and feel it enter your body and you've acquired your fragment of possibility.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: It doesn't take much to distract Cali. You just point over there and she's like--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take a swig and go down the hole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a little bit of that damp water and moisture that seeped into the chamber previously from just being near the swamp. It wasn't a thick layer of water, maybe half an inch or so in the actual portions of the chamber and some of it is now heading down. As you're climbing down carefully through this hole, you can feel it running down your back and it's this cold swamp water. I need you to make an athletics check as you make your way down this chamber.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not great. Just a check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. Just add your athletics.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven. Okay. You begin to-- (grunts) and you lose your grip and begin slide down like a slide.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispers) Yes. (screams)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (impact) You get about maybe 15 or so feet before the back of the slide leaves you. You have darkvision, so you see the interior of some sort of chamber in the ground rocketing towards you--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will throw out a feather and cast Feather Fall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. And you gingerly land on your feet. No damage taken. And no noise made either.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (breathing heavily)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking around you, you see the inside of a natural rock chamber. You can hear in the distance a rummaging sound, some shifting over from around the corner. It seems like from where you're landing the back is around you and then it curves to the left. You see a faint puddle before you lose vision and beyond that, you don't see anything but you hear (shifting).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Coming towards me or just moving?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just echoing around the side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear a (monster hissing).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Something clatter to the ground. What are the rest of you guys doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we hear the slip and the whoosh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't think you heard anything, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should send a message to Nott and see what she sees.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: What, Bren?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nott Bren, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I can do that.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Bren, are you down there? Hello?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you sending a message?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How are you doing down there, what do you see?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will reply to that message.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With you and me, it goes back and forth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's a creature down here. I don't want to make any noise. If you're going to come down to join me, use a rope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it one or more than one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. I'll go rushing in and find out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the opposite of what I said!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to gingerly creep around the corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check for me, please.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's hard to resist sneaking in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's climb down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A single fin curves over the top of its head. No nose, but two gleaming eyes that refract. What little bit of light coming into the chamber from something out of the visual range is giving off a faint glow. The lower half of its body is a long fish tail. It looks like that a nightmare-ish merman would look like. It sits there clutching some sort of long harpoon-like pike with a hook on the end of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are they waiting, are they talking, what are they doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Around the base of them, you see broken crates and a few odds and ends are resting on the ground, loosely discarded.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Any other entrances or exits?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you can see? You're kind of peeking around the corner, you cannot see the opposite end of where this curvature is without possibly revealing yourself.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It has been a while, what would you like us to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anywhere else to hide, or something to hide behind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Around that way? Not terribly. There are a few outcropping walls, and at this point I would say I could probably give you a visual.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Already?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like what I'm hearing! Shark fins and shit?! I'm a happy camper.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: While you're setting the stage, I'll message back up to them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, what is that, what are they riding? They're riding like watery penises.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, you're right there, curving around the side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did I come down right where I am?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You landed right here and then made your way around. This is where it drops you into the middle of the chamber.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Got it. I'll radio back up to the top and say: There are three mermen down here with dangerous weapons. I am very outnumbered. Please come quickly, you can reply to this message.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we've established that. Stay put, don't move.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll cast Mage Hand and take a ball bearing across the way, but not dropping it, just holding it in place, just in case.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So who's going down?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I drop Frumpkin down the shoot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh Jesus, he's going to die!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, he's not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's not a long fall for a cat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to find out how far.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not within like 50 feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, they can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah they can, most of them. Make an acrobatics check for me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we start tying a rope off upstairs and drop it down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My acrobatics or the cat's?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The cat's acrobatics.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh great, hold on, I've got that pulled up right here, hold on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you going to land on your feet for the cat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Frumpkin lands.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've tied our ropes together and we're going to go down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Double knot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Double knot? All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can go down first and make sure it's secure on the other end.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sailors' knot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's actually coiled at the bottom. Total, it's about a 60-foot way down. You manage to make you way down without an issue.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I help anyone else down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So with the rope and everything, aiding you down here, it's easy enough for you all to make your way into this area.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy, they have all of us all crammed up in this little space.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What else are we going to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to point out, we can't retreat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kiri's coming down with you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, wait. We're not bringing Kiri down, are we? Are you guys bringing Kiri down?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can't leave Kiri up there. Who knows what's up there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you guys having this conversation?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We had it upstairs. Kiri!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chirping)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (shushing) Sit in this corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Cali) "I killed people."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (shushing) No. Sit in the corner, Kiri, right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chirping)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't move unless something chases you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Jester) "Don't move unless something chases you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Jester) "Right."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What if she dies?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Holds the dagger in front of her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's upstairs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's down here with us.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: She's down here with us, in the corner?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so Kiri is going to go ahead and duck into this corner, here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: She's better not die.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, wait. Kiri is down here with us in the corner?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, what are you guys doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's kill the fish people.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, we're going to go. We're doing this.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Do you want me to start this explosively?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I mean, I'm asking.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is kind of enclosed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I think that's a great idea, but we should also send Bren with you, and if you guys could go simultaneous, like. Maybe if Bren hit one of them, and then you follow right away.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Ooh! It might manage the goods that Bren told us about that are around the corner. Like all the crates and stuff. I mean, my bowls should be okay, but are you here for something?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sometimes I'm able to focus just shy of what I'm trying to target.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Oh, it's a pretty tight space around there, I'm not sure! I could try.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If your bowls are magical, though, they should survive, right?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Yeah, I know. They should be fine, but I mean for you guys, what do you want?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we all jump out at the same time and scream and attack at the same time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like that idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, let's ambush.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like three, two, one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (quiet yell) Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I still think that these two would be good to lead that charge.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Give the explosive things--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We shouldn't do explosive because--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, you're watching.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Uh-oh. Something's happening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It (speaking in Aquan). The other one (speaking in Aquan). It turns around and splashes back into this little pool and vanishes below the surface.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there anyway to freeze the water or get rid of the water?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, dry up the water!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are they still talking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Briefly chatting, but in the process of eating, more than anything.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I think I could freeze about five-foot, that's the amount I can do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's a pool in the back there. That's where they entered and exited from.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about ten square feet.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I can freeze half of it. It's oddly specific how much I can freeze.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does anyone want to try to talk to these things, or are we just (cutting)?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: They look like murderous fish men.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're good to fuck them up, I think.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: We could try!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I don't think that's a good idea.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I like how that sounds. (like Cali) Murderous fish men.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Murderous fish men!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I love it.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Have any of you seen Thor: Ragnarok?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah! I was going to say, you sound like them, I love it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I could blind them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't you speak fish?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're half fish!

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: You're half fish?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not half fish, I'm half-orc!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He was born underwater!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is actually not true at all. Nott, not at all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is the other half?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You're half-orc, but what's the other half?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Half-human, I'd assume.

lines.name: MARISHA, ASHLEY
lines.text: You assume.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're glossing over it, but we've seen you vomit sea water twice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Once.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this really the moment to talk about this?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Jester's really smart!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Right now's the moment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Quick, tell us your backstory!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know how under pressure, you can discover hidden talent? Maybe if you do this, you'll be like: Oh, I never knew this fishman side of me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone make a stealth check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, jeez. We're losing our ambush, y'all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Someone create a distraction! We'll pop out and kill it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I rolled a six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was the number you rolled?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It was a four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so that's six.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 15. I've already activated a sword.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Drei.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, average, average.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As they're all eating, and Nott, you're paying attention, one goes, (inquisitive growl, garbled speech)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to Mage Hand throw the ball bearing first, just as a signal to go. On the three-two-one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then we jump out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you throw the ball bearings, and then everyone rolls initiative. You lost the surprise round, unfortunately. You were spending too much time talking.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We're trying to get backstory!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Half-carp, half-orc. Orcarp. Carporc? Corpor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 to 20, anybody?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm-- wait, 25 to 20? No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nobody? Nobody, huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so we have Beau, Fjord-- what did you get? 18. And then Molly at 16. 15 to ten?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Zehn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, Ashley!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yasha, and then Nott and Caleb are equal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then, what was it, Caleb and Nott?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb and Nott got ten, ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Ten to five?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Six. Six twins.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester and Cali.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, does Kiri get a turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, Kiri's staying in the back. All right, that's everybody. Top of the round, as all three of them have spun around, apparently aware that something is lurking in this area of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It still doesn't see us, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For six seconds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but it's not an ambush round. So. Top of the round is Beau, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I hold my turn until Fjord goes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't hold your turn. You can hold an action.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do what you're going to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All the bad stealth checks were--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Big three.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Big six.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten, right. Okay, got it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We die first.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scheisse.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I move into place and then hold my action until Fjord goes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Depending on what your action trigger is, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to attack after he attacks, after he casts a spell. Can I move in this corner as far as I can--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here, next to Nott?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to stealth-- yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stealthing as fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. And you're holding your action in case Fjord attacks something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to hold my shurikens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So as you're pulling back with that, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to run around the corner. Give me that right over here. Yeah, so I can see all three of them, at least.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Well, you're going to be out in the open. Just so you're aware. All right. So you move over here. You can now see all three right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 'Sup, fish-fucks! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They all turn, (growls). You see some of them holding what looks to be these large harpoon-trident things that are hooked on the end and they have some sort of thick cabling of some kind attached to the end of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aren't y'all pretty? I look. In the space in between them, I see this ripple start to form, and I reach out with my hand, and I'll grasp at the space and tear a rip in reality, and I'll cast Hunger of Hadar, ripping this 20-foot dome on the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20-foot radius? Where do you want to place it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll put it right here, so it's-- Actually? No, I'll stick it right here. Yeah, because it halves it, makes it difficult terrain, so let's put it right there. Ish.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. So you watch suddenly as the back end of that chamber-- well, for those who can see, which Caleb currently-- it's mostly dark except for that faint, faint glow around the corner that you don't see the source. There's no light in here. That light goes out. You are blind at the moment, because what little bit of light there is has been consumed by this sphere of darkness that Fjord has summoned on the opposite side of the chamber. You watch as reality tears open in that space, and you see these strange, black-purple otherworldly tentacles whip out from the outside of it, and you hear this horrible slithering sound within the center of that chamber, with this faint underlying of whispers and chanting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does that do immediate damage, or only on their turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Only if they start in it, or if they end their turn in it. Two different types of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cool, all right. So that ends your turn, there. Molly, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's me. I get to go first. Can I pop around the corner?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me see here, real fast, about the Hunger of Hadar spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have my goggles on, by the by.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you cannot see anything. You have your goggles on--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: --but I still can't see?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, actually, it says the void is filled with a cacophony of soft whispers. No light, magical, or otherwise, can illuminate the area of the 20-foot sphere--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. But you have Darkvision.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's just within the sphere they're blind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. So I'll say you can see where they are, but it's a little obscured, so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to pop out. Can I pop out? Am I able to do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are. Well no, I'm sorry, you cannot move. You did your move, so you have to have an action, so you can only attack that one that you can see there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I will throw two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. They're at disadvantage, because it's beyond your 20-foot initial range.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: First one? Man. I'll take that 12, though, for an 18 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does hit, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And that's-- sorry. Seven damage on that one. And then second one... ooh, those are double fours, which I don't believe hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. Disappears into the darkness.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then I'm going to take a ki point and cast-- I almost called it Uncanny Dodge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You had to do that on your turn. You've only got an action you were holding. Sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How high's the ceiling here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about ten, 11 feet. It's not very high.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would have had to have said it earlier, which I didn't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Molly?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where am I? Let's see. I'm over there? I'm going to run as far as I can go towards Fjord, and then I'm going to spend the rest of my action running across and get into that little alcove.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one over here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, the other side of it, I'm so sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, like behind that little--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, I see. There we go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So positioning and ready for things to come.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have a bonus, if you want to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got nothing for my bonus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Did you activate one of your scimitars?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One is activated, the other is not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got it, cool. That ends your turn? It is now their turn. So, top of the round, they're both in the space, so they take how much damage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They take 2d6--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 2d6 cold damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Each of them. Do I roll that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. So roll all at once.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cold. (impacts) Tentacle beating!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, so this one's going to go ahead and move just to the edge there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's dead, he's dead! Too late.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's how it works.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This guy gets to about there, actually, before he can move into the water. Right now, because they don't have a huge movement on land.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And they're in difficult terrain, so it's halved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That guy does manage to move--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sweet, then they end their turn!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you just send whatever you've got in the sphere. Trying to keep them in one spot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to continue slithering the rest of the way. (counting) I'll say it gets him to about there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: At the end of their turns, they must succeed on a dexterity saving throw--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it's not the end of their turn yet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, sorry. My fault.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two, while still blinded, saw you emerge. The one over on this end is going to go ahead and attempt to throw one of its harpoons in your direction. It's blinded, so it has disadvantage on the attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With disadvantage, that's a 16. What's your armor class?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aw, slick! It shoots through and you deflect it with the shield and watch it spark off. The one behind it is going to throw as well. Natural one, yeah. It chucks the harpoon. Both of them land on the ground, and you hear them scrape as they're pulled back to where they are. The one that is right there in front of you is going to throw another harpoon. It's going to throw a harpoon at you. Still at disadvantage. That is a 20 to hit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You suffer, as it jams and pierces into your abdomen, right past the armor, sticking a couple inches into your chest. You take 11 points of piercing damage and I need you to make a strength check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't get dragged!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have to make a constitution saving throw to keep the spell. Okay, strength save. Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20. You get dragged right up into its space right there. Make a constitution saving throw to see if you can maintain concentration on your spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do I have to make? I forget.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have to roll under the spell damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you succeed that one. Now it's pulled you in. It's going to go ahead and make a bite attack against you, as it pulls you in. Its jaw opens up to strike you. That is an 18 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you have 17 armor. You take seven points of piercing damage as it digs its jaws right into the front of your chest and shoulder area, biting down. Make another constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, all three of them have to make a dexterity saving throw or receive the damage again. That is a fail, a fail, and a fail! Two, ten, and a three!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is a six and a one, so seven points of acid damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice! That ends their turn. That brings us to Yasha.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right! How close can I get to this guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're ten feet away.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can use an action to dash if you want to make the rest of the movement, but you won't have an action on your turn.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I won't have an action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have anything good on a bonus?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can do the rage, but then it can go away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you don't take damage by the end of your next turn, then yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Which is possible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unless you move into the tentacle range.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tentacle range?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what his spell is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh boy. Oh you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's what it says.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I hold my action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. You're going to hold for what?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If he tries to fight or attack Fjord again, I could-- that's not going to work. Oh god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just within range? Until he's in range?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. Until he gets in range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Holding your attack just in case it comes in range. That ends your turn, Yasha. Nott and Caleb, you're up with Jester and Cali on deck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You want me to go? Yeah, sure. I'm going to move forward until I can see-- no, Frumpkin's going to go first. I'm going to pull a Shakäste and use Frumpkin to help me see in here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have to ask you, as a DM, can my cat see in the dark?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does your cat have darkvision?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know, it doesn't say.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, remember? You looked at this before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't remember, but I know that my cats could see in the dark growing up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We did this last--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it does not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to say: Beau!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I cast Enlarge on Beauregard so that she's ten and a half feet tall.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Has it been an hour by the way? My Light spell still would be going so Caleb might be able to see the first area.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first area, but nothing beyond that space.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If that's the case, then I wouldn't go that far forward. I would stay as far away from danger as I can that as soon as I see Beauregard, cast Enlarge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. Beau has swollen to an enlarged state.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm so swole!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's Amazon women singing right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau takes up this entire space now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn, Beau's big.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At a ten-foot ceiling Beau, you suddenly crouch. You're now hunched forward with the top of it grinding against the top of your head and shoulders.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You got to pull a Vega position.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fjord. Aw fuck. 12.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does that get advantage?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why would I have advantage?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Aren't they in combo-- wouldn't that be sneak attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If he hits, it's sneak attack. He doesn't get advantage, so it misses, unfortunately.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll shoot again. Slightly better. 14?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 does hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does this one get sneak attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Terrible. Nine. 13 plus I'll take Fury of the Small, so that's 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 points of damage. All righty. That ends your turn?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then, can I get all the way to Mollymauk on my movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can. Right over there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi! Want some booze?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: After!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester and Cali.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to run over behind Frumpkin, in that little alcove. Actually, that's a lie. I'm going to go next to Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, back a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Even more. Then I am going to cast Invoke Duplicity. I'm going to Invoke Duplicity! She's going to run forward and stand next to Fjord!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. All righty. That's your turn, Jester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, because that's my action.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: How far can Cali get into, full movement, close to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 30, about there.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: About there. So I'll move there. You watch as the draconic eye-- she brushes the hair out of the way. She focuses on the one fighting Fjord, and a sickly green beam will shoot out of the eye, and I'm going to cast Ray of Sickness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Sicker than a ray of light!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Madonna, Ray of Light? Circa 2002? Jesus!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: That's a failure, so it takes nine poison damage and it's poisoned until the end of my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Great. It's poisoned until the end of your next turn. As the bolt hits it, the veins all of a sudden go dark on its torso where it impacts.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Then as she starts as the combat's going, she's going to be like: Come on, let's kill these things. You start seeing a little bit of-- becomes a bit more draconic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ending Cali's turn. Beau, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh wait, after Jester?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester went. She Invoked Duplicity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I'm sorry. So me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Enlarged Beau is crouching down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I get to the doucher?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (deep voice) Sorry, my voice is even deeper now! Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This giant foot right next to you, Nott, as Beau's large form almost stomps on you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 'Sup, Nott Bran? First attack. Okay. 16?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16, that hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Second attack. Not good. 11?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That misses.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. First attack. All right, ten damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten damage with your staff. As you rush up, crouching low, you take the staff and jam it down into it. It looks back at you. It sees you looming by. As it pulls up its harpoon to try and defend, you jam the staff into its chest, shove it to the ground, under the water, and hear a crunch as you collapse its ribcage with the impact.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, is it dead?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's taken the brunt of your damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What happens to the harpoon and the cord sticking out of me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The harpoon fell out of the wound. It's loose on the ground. There's a pretty nice puncture wound through your armor and your body right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I appreciate it (pained sounds).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You good? Okay. Good. Could I take the staff, and I pick it up with the fish still on it, and I'm like: It's fish kebabs!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not a thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is today. That's what's on the menu.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is Paul!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 20 feet behind, you hear: This is all I wanted!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Too many one-liners! Can I do something creative and take my staff with my fish on it, and fling it, and try and throw the fish cadaver at the other fish dudes?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're casting? With bait?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You sure can. So you take it, and you fling it into the darkness, and it (flopping).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh come on, man. I can't try to aim to attack--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've already used your action to do your attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I have a bonus action!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bonus action's an unarmed strike, so this is a flavor, as you throw it into the darkness that they can't see. You hear its body--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You said I could use flavor for unarmed shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were, but there was nothing to hit that's unarmed in your face. You do fling it in there, and you hear this horrible slurping sound as whatever--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He told me to be flavorful!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you were. And whatever tear in reality that was opened by Fjord's patron devours the corpse. It's plucked out of the air and sucked through whatever small rip in reality had opened.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Still pretty cool, Beau, still pretty cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So can I take my actual bonus action to do Patient Defense?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. All right, that ends your turn. Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to hug this wall if I can, back up a little bit, and I'm going to hold Eldritch Blast if I see them emerge from the darkness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that ends your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did I have any more movement, by the by?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did have a little bit more, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Could I have scooched up a bit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could have, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just a scooch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm scooching!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Excuse me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can scoot all the way up to here, if you want.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got very long legs right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're squat-moving your way through the cavern.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: A core stance is very good for your abs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Molly, what do you got?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There ain't nothing for me to hit, so I'm going to slightly peek out around the corner, so that I can keep an eye on things, and I'm going to hold my attack for anything that comes within range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. It's now their turn. Top of the turn, they take 2d6 damage, so go ahead and roll that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two, three. Five points of cold damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got it. You hear (snarling) and (slurping) sound on the inside of this darkened sphere. This guy manages to get into the water and poke his way through, but just barely get his vision out. This guy's going to come out as well and encounter Beau on that element. They're both still inside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're still inside the tentacles?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, the circle should be a little further forward, so yeah they're just--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're still inside. And another one arrives here, and can only move there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We don't know that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Since he's going to end his turn there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20 on the harpoon, and then for the bite attack, that's going to be a 23.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, they both.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The harpoon is going to be 24 points of piercing damage as it jams right into your chest, pushing you against the wall. Go ahead and make a concentration check, if you don't mind. You have to beat 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to attempt to bite you in the face-- The bite, it actually hit. That's going to be a d8. That's eight points of piercing damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you at, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know, I can't add this fast, my app's breaking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where did my dice go? There it is. No, the Snitch fell away, I need to keep it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It touched the ground, that means it's cursed now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It tried to run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It did want to come home.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, so make a second concentration check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13's fine, you maintain concentration. The other one that's right next to Beau is going to attempt to also throw its harpoon at you, since it saw that you were the source of this. They're trying to break the spell.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go ahead and cast some bullshit on that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were holding an attack. You'll have to say that—

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is a reaction. I'm doing a Blood Maledict. The next two attacks are disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're amplifying it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it. So roll the damage, that's disadvantage on that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One point of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 17 to hit. What's your armor class?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. It still hits the first strike. The harpoon (crashing) into you. That's going to be 12 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I go unconscious. I use my Relentless Endurance to pop back up to one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Upon seeing Fjord get super daze-y, can I use my Sentinel feat to crack this guy who just tried to attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. While this is happening, roll a concentration check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 19 plus all that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And make a strength check for me, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm super strong. Where the fuck is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 on its side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get dragged 20 feet through the water into range with it. Beau, you make your Sentinel Strike on it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20, nice. Go ahead and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was awesome. Doubling the dice, that's eight plus four, which is 12, plus another dice, that's two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dice of the enlarged is also doubled, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's right. That's two plus another four. Sorry, that's two doubled which is four, so that's 16 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 points of damage. Crack!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As he grabs the chain, big Beau steps on the chain and cracks him right in the face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It goes to bite you, and you manage to pull up your sword in the way and block it. Its jaws open and this terrible fishing breath smell cascades over your face.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like a dock on a Tuesday morning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What happens on Monday nights?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one on the other end is blind, it hears all this noise happening, it's going to make a wide shot with its harpoon in the direction of where it's hearing all this conflict.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hit one of its brothers!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, Fjord. You take--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: At disadvantage? 16 doesn't hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, those are the dice rolls that I was making. It was a 16 and a 19. So that's nine points of piercing damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's throwing in the dark in the direction where two guys, and he's threading them and hitting me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You guys have done it before.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough. Unconscious I go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that, Fjord goes down, and the spell fades. It closes off. They now have visual.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But that's all of their turns, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This guy's going to move.

lines.name: MARISHA
