lines.text: Except for that motherfucker.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait, didn't he burn his whole turn just getting to where he was?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that was his movement. That's right, so he wouldn't move. He went top of the round. Thank you for the reminder of that. But he used his action to throw that. So that's all he has. That ends their go. Yasha, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to move to the guy who's been attacking my boy, Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one here? All right. In the water or on the side?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: On the side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I would like to rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Going the full Yasha, angry.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Divine Fury, all the bits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott and Caleb, you're up next.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Reckless. Okay, that hits. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 hits.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the first strike with the Divine, 3d6 plus seven.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ooh. 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 points of damage on the first strike as you carve across its torso, it hisses back, still standing, though.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Another--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 2d6 plus five.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, ten. 2d6 plus five?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, six plus what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 points of damage? As the first blade strike carves down its body, it pulls back hissing, Fjord's unconscious, sinking underwater with the harpoon still sticking out of his chest, as it's leaning back at an angle as he vanishes into the dark liquid. As it pulls back, it yanks the harpoon from his body, and you see his body slightly lurch up out of the water before sinking again. It pulls it back to strike at you with it, and when you pull the blade back, you thrust it right into its chest, and the light goes out of its eyes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you close enough to the bonus action-- Can someone grab Fjord or is that not happening?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I as a bonus action--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's an action.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't worry if I sink.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll be able to fix him in a second.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have that armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true, you have the armor on. He starts to sink, and the body buoys itself back to the top.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it like a life vest?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a life preserver, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the Mariner's armor that he had the enchantment put over.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Throw me a Bud Light.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, that ends Yasha's turn. Nott and Caleb, you guys are up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb is going to walk behind Cali so he's got a good view of merman over Fjord. I'm going to use the Glove of Blasting. First one is a natural one, so that does not hit. The second one is a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Against which one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Against the one right over Fjord. So that is, Scheisse.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, Marisha.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you in melee with that thing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 12 total, since it was a crit. Is it still up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is still up. As it bursts into it, the flames burn across its system, but its body is damp and slick anyway, so you see the dark black scorch marks, but nothing more than that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the third ray is not good, just a ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will lean out, and is someone engaged with this one, where I would get sneak attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will attack with a crossbow bolt. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Ooh, that's all terrible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, not all terrible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. As you fire this one, it manages to pierce right under its throat, and it turns back towards you and it grabs the harpoon off the ground. As it pulls it back, the blood's gouting out of a major vein or artery in its throat. It tries to get the strength, and as it does, it pulls back and gets woozy, throws it, and it lands maybe two feet from where it grabs it, and with a horrible gurgle falls to the ground. It begins to slip and sink into the water.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit. Can I use my bonus action to fire the other one? Why not?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Disadvantage on this one, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's six points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice! That ends Nott's turn. Are you going to move?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I will stay there and huddle closer to Mollymauk. Did you step out?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I did step out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'm huddling away from Mollymauk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Cali and Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to send Duplicity me towards Fjord, and she's in her illusion going to hug him and cast Cure Wounds. I will call from a distance going, "Don't worry, Fjord, you'll be okay!" I'll cast it at level two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aw, because Oskar?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So 11 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are conscious. (gasping) You look up and see the faintly illusory image of Jester holding you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thanks, Jester.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then big me over top of her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi, Fjord! Good to see you alive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's wrong with Beau?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I'm going to use my bonus action to cast Spiritual Weapon right over top of the other fish man in the back there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (singing) Lollipop, lollipop.

lines.name: MATT, ASHLEY
lines.text: (singing) Oh lolly, lolly, lolly, lollipop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pop! (singing) Roll that attack roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 14 plus something, so I think that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Its armor class is 13.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So that is 1d8 plus four. Force damage, so eight force damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. That ends Jester's go. Cali.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Am I within 15 feet there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Okay. She stops for a moment and you see this green magic flow around. I'm going to cast Dragon's Breath at 3rd-level on myself. Then she inhales. Acid breath, 15-foot cone over the creature.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, 15-foot cone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know what you just did, but I am so into it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the acid sprays out towards it, it covers the area.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Dex saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a failure.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: So that's 4d6 damage. Oh, I was going to reroll some of this, but I'm not now. So that's going to be 19 acid damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty scarred from that immediate spray across the front part of its torso.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: (deep voice) Come on! Come and get me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, top of the round, you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to stride forward (large footsteps).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Careful of your head.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (thuds) Ugh!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ah, fuck! This is what Travis deals with all the time. Ow! Through Cali's acid mist, I'm going to split the air and cut down and do a big slap right on its face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. As you go for the big sweep, your staff goes (scraping) (thud).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I get a little bit of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bits of rock and shale is being ground and falling all around you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It probably gets stuck a little bit, but then it gives me a nice little snap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly, a little snap at the end. Roll for the attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'll take that. That's enough. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 20. 19. I don't know. It's enough.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 19. Add that d4, motherfucker!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, that's nine plus--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cocked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 points of damage. That's the first strike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The second one, knowing I'm going to get stuck on the ceiling, I'm going to paddle back and come up and crack with the other end.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you spin it this way, it wedges itself from the floor to the ceiling and you have to like-- boom!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Damn it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mike Myers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plus seven plus-- ten total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten points of damage. Whack! You crack into it and it hits into its torso. It looks like it's bleeding out of its mouth onto its stomach. It looks really painfully hurt and its eyes are dashing around each way. It looks like it's starting to turn its head towards the area where it emerged.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to do flurry of blows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, using a ki point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Flurry of Beaus.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Flurry of blows.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Flurry of Beaus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not great. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 misses.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Second one is even fucking worse. It's a two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This time, as you try to punch, it manages to dodge the first one, and the second time you go to swing, one of the pieces of stone that had dislodged slightly from when you had impacted it falls and catches your fist in the middle of the air. It shatters and causes this cloud of dust to cross the creature but your hand fucking hurts!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Haha, good show!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you get one more hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's it. End of Beau's turn. Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll use half my speed to stand upright.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Back to there, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I'll unleash two Eldritch Blasts at that--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And that's cocked. Reach for the sky! And an 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six points of damage on the first one, and 14 points of damage on the second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? It's turning around and slithering away. It's about to dive back into the water and probably disappear into a subterranean tunnel that's filled.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I stand up. I get to my feet. I touch the wound area and I fire it across the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you release your hand, both bolts arc outward and slam into it from the back. From the front perspective, it would look like Guyver, how he tears the chest and the beams come out, but instead it's its internal organs being shoved out into the wall and there's two open holes, Tombstone-style, before it hits the water and slithers and sinks down into the small tunnel.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (twangy singing) I got friends in eldritch places.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, did you say it fell into the hole?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The impact hit it and began (sucking).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't let it go into the hole!

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: We're out of initiative? Or are we--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're out of initiative at this point.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Okay. I run up and with the clawed hand, she dives into try and grab this thing out of the pool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Make a dexterity saving throw to see if you can react quick enough.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I assist for advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. It's less of a skill check. It's more of a reactionary thing, so you wouldn't be able to help with it.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five? Okay, you're trying to reach it, but it sunk too low.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to take my staff and try the same thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're hitting stone and then nothing, just water below.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: So when Beau's doing that, she turns around and snaps at Beau. (rough voice) Get away from my stuff! That's my kill! (normal voice) Sorry. I didn't mean to yell. Sorry about that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey, we're all friends here.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Yeah, I know. We are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I cast Friends.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Yeah, of course we are. Sorry. Sometimes, I just get really aggressive sometimes. I'm sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. That was intense. There's a lot in that. Are you going to be all right?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Thank you for looking out for me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're right. You're going to feel a little weird in a few minutes. I apologize for that. It's a thing. Let's clear this water and let's take a breather. Let's sit down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's get this guy out of the tunnel in case somebody comes through the tunnel. I don't want anyone to see him right away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you clear the water?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do and you see that the tunnel curves below and evens out. It sunk, hit the bottom sediment, and dragged a little bit and came to rest about maybe 15 feet below the surface. You take a moment to dive under, grab it, and whether through a chain of hands or whatever, because it's pretty heavy. It's a large body, probably weighs close to 800 pounds. So you guys have to all together pull it up, and it takes a few moments to do so. But Jester's pretty beefy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me and Yasha basically got it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Between the two of you, you eventually get it up back into the chamber.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roughly a minute later, I say: So you have been somewhat charmed by a circus carnie. It's going to be okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point the Friends spell ends, and you can feel an influence that was previously there over your personality.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You seemed a little angry. He didn't mean anything by it.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: It's fine. It's fine. (deep breath)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just trying to keep everything copacetic and in order.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I know. Thank you, Mr. Caleb. Thank you. No, it's fine. I do understand why. It's fine. Thank you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thought you needed a minute of clarity.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: It's great. You guys are nice. Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, you have a lot of scales on your face, but look at this one. Look at this one. Look at this one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This one less so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can deal with tempers.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That one as well.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: You all look fantastic. She's so cute as well. You're really lucky.

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: Kiri?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is she all right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am keeping an eye on these pools, looking for any movement, by the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kiri comes around the corner with the dagger, sees you all standing there (chirping).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You did it. You killed them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Runs up to the body there and goes (dagger slice). (like Cali) "I killed people!"

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: It's like Chappie. Chappie be good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stabs the body a few more times.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's enough.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Somebody help me check these crates.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to start looking through as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, who's helming the investigation? Okay, an individual has to helm it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to investigate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Caleb, you're being aided, so make it with advantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I've got a high stat in it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Cali.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cocked.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Yes, Ms. Beau?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That wasn't cocked, technically.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well it was on a magnet, so it was stuck to a magnet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, did it? Okay. Metal dice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At advantage? We'll call the first one, which was a three on a magnet, and the second roll was a 17 plus my eight is a 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a light die. It's not like a heavy one that wouldn't be affected by the magnet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, it does magnet. It does actually magnet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can do this for the future.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have you not played with your Gil die yet?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, it totally sticks to it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Digging through the natural gravel and sand floor of this chamber, you find that a lot of it has just been buried. They weren't interested in gold pieces. They weren't interested in money. A lot of that was left behind and scattered and has been covered. You take a moment to pull through and you manage to acquire 185 gold, 210 silver pieces, and 65 copper pieces.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 210 silver, you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Distribute that equally, however you would do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. We'll do some math.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find a bunch of jewelry, necklaces, and rings that are thrown about and lost.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you see any diamonds? Do you see 300 gold worth of diamonds?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I put a bunch of jewelry into Jester's hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All the jewelry together would come to about, just for purposes of resale, 250 gold worth of jewelry. There are no diamonds in there worth 300 gold, sorry. There are four sets of manacles.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Manacles?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Trading in manacles all the time. These didn't work!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The official currency of it. Nice manacles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The manacles are empty, though they are bloody.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You said four sets of manacles?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, four sets of bloody manacles.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do they have any rune-ish markings on them or anything like that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, these do not. These are plain manacles.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are they humanoid sized?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roughly, yeah. There are a number of broken vials of some thick purple liquid, but two of them are not broken. You rolled really high on your investigation. So two vials of a thick purple liquid, roughly about that big. It's a thick, oily substance.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'd like to take these for a moment. Or maybe ten moments.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, you see one thing, helping Caleb out, and you pull it out. It looks to be a well-crafted marble bowl of gold inlay of a curious design. The edges of the bowl shift into five multiple dragon heads, equally separated and in each dragon, the eyes are tiny gemstones. One set's rubies, one set's emeralds, one set's sapphires, one set's diamond.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will try to conceal this from Cali.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cali, make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gasping)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have luck? Oh, it was the--

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We treat guests so well!

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: That's what Nott would do. Absolutely what Nott would do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're so mean.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: She's just looking through the crates.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking through frantically, you don't see anything there.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I'm sure it was here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really, people don't like it when you do these things, Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just have to confer with Caleb.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, Cali. I started a conversation earlier.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Hey, Ms. Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there a reason why you like cute things? I'm not saying that not all of us like cute things. We all love cute things, but you seem to really like cute things.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I guess it's just one of those things where-- and she's doing this as she's going through the crates-- I was a kid and I used to ask for dolls and pets and stuff when I was growing up and the cult used to give them to me. Serissa used to give them to me. I don't know. There's a lot of bad stuff in the world and it's nice to appreciate nice things sometimes. I like having and finding cute stuff. Do you not like that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just might appreciate some other things.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Your outfit's cute though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man, thank you.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: That's all right. You're welcome. I was sure it was here. I traced it. I followed them. I knew that it was coming through this-- Maybe I missed it. Maybe I've messed up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How deep is that pool?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It gets about five or six feet deep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to search the bottom of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check with disadvantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there any weapons that the merrow dropped? The hook or the spears? Or were they tridents or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're all hooked at the tips and they had this thick rope cable on the edge that they were using to pull them back in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I pick up one of the tridents. Does it seem like an average--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just a trident.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would propose-- I just rolled a 17 on perception to see if Caleb noticed Nott even do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to come tell you anyways.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, but you rolled a 28, so it would be super hard for anyone at the table to have seen it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, no one noticed. Nobody noticed.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm still keeping watch. I'm watching the hole.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wanted to look in the pools too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can she give me advantage on that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Usually you got to tell me before you roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. We didn't want to interrupt the thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It doesn't matter anyway, it's eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's brackish and thick and you don't find much of interest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Check that other one too in a moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do find some bones.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I can clear the water as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking through, you find a number of discarded humanoid skeletons. Four of them, to be exact.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The other one, then.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe it's in the next room. There's still another room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There is?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They were coming from somewhere. Who knows, there could be 20 of them on the other side of this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's true. Could be a whole network of caverns.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we fill in the hole?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we're going to have to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Until we find--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh! We have thunder sticks!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We do have boom boom sticks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is this the end of our task here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're supposed to secure the safehouse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As they're having this conversation, you feel this strange crawling sensation in the back of your head as you're looking past this pool down into the darkness below. Even though it's clear, you can see the ripples, and there's something gently tugging you in that direction, and a familiar voice creeps in, sourceless, within your brain, that says, "Learn."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So anyway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We just killed Fjord's family.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like we should check and see if there's 20 of them on the other side of this thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or like you said, we just destroy the entrance to where they can't come through.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't we have a cat that can become a fish?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It takes time, and equipment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus, some of us can swim. We could pop down real quick and see what's down there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm taking those two purple vials and walking around the corner over this way to set them down and start doing my thing, and I'm going to start pulling out my book.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will join him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anyone else feel like going for a swim?

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could probably join you for a swim.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I need to check and make sure it's not here, and if there is a room back there I need to make sure it's not here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't know if there's going to be air on the other side of that, though, so we need people that can--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, one person that can breathe really well. Fjord, you are familiar with the sea. Can you hold your breath for a long time?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, pretty decent.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. How about you go--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like, forever?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As long as you don't mind dying, sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have gills?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What if we tie a rope to you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure, we have an extra 50 feet, we didn't really need the rest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we take a short rest again? Oh, it's another hour.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to do this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you can only do it once a day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What, the--

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Short rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, short rest you can do as many times as you want, yeah.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: It's the long rest you can only do once every day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're low on health still, aren't you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but I mean, we're fine. Let's do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you want to just swim and back. You're going to swim and come back?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to go down, and if I start running short on air, I'll come back up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll have a rope tied.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Cure Wounds on you, if we're not going to take short rest, if we're not going to take a short rest--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just a quick little recon.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Here. Tie it around.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I drop the rope and jump in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As they're doing this, I'm going to come up to Caleb and tap him on the shoulder and say: Caleb, look what I found! I think this is the bowl that Cali was talking about.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I instantly cast Identify-- it takes one minute-- on the two vials and the bowl.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm over here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On the other side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You went all the way around the other side?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I have a minus one, it's a 13. She's pretty oblivious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, there's no way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are the worst people.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: As if I didn't know that coming in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We might be the third from the worst people.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "As if I didn't know that coming here." That's the worst thing anyone has said about us.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I know how The Mighty Nein works.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bowl is magical. It is used as a communion device. When granted with enough blood and given the proper ritual, it's used to acquire auguries, various bits of divination, and communication across the Divine Gate with whatever this Scaled Tyrant may be.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But it needs a lot of blood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It needs enough to fill the bowl.

lines.name: LAIM
lines.text: I can tell from my Identify spell that its purpose is to speak with this thing on the other side, this deity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some sort of communion, that's all you can make out from it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about the vials?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The vials are not magically enchanted.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That sucks. Nothing to be told, okay. I don't want this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hold on, Identify should--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't want the bowl?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Do you think it's bad to give it to her?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm not there, but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you think it's bad to give it to her?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know. It is not of any use to us, I don't think.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Then let's give it to her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I stick it into my satchel for the time being.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What are you guys doing? You're underwater. Fjord, you're swimming down, going through the darkness, keeping your way there. It goes under for about 30 feet, 40 feet. You're pulling your way across the ceiling as it levels out, curves a bit, straightens. Lungs start to hurt a little bit, but you're still holding your breath okay, pulling your way through this darkness.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This makes me feel so uncomfortable.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not okay with this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is college all over again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pull under, and you're uncertain as to where it'll end, and that brief little peaking fear in the back of your mind, flashes and memories of being under the ocean, of the shipwreck, of looking up and not knowing which direction was up. That gives you this brief surge of vertigo. You stop for a second, and a couple bubbles escape. Go ahead and make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21. You push through, continue, swim across, swim. "Learn." You come up, and all of a sudden you can see now, it begins to rise up once more, and you begin to swim up, pull across the front, and then suddenly your fingers break water, but you do so carefully. Take a breath slowly as your head emerges from the dark water in what is a large, darkened chamber. Make a perception check with disadvantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see where this 15, 20-foot pool that you've emerged from opens up into this chamber that is filled with low water and a number of divots and pools within. The bars of land are limited and thin. You see from the peripheral of your vision, before it ends at that point, roughly five or six more of these creatures. You see a very faint glow in the distance, a number of objects that are piled and shoved into a central place. You see elements, old pieces of stone structures that have fallen in. This chamber inside here had a built or constructed purpose long ago, and since has crumbled as the earth has shifted. That's as much as you can make out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take a big breath, blow it all the way out. (inhales deeply) Go back under, push back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, cool. Making your way through, now you know the path is there, the confidence because you know there is air eventually helps you push through. You make it halfway through--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's the depth like as I'm going through?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about 15, 20 feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So I can see the bottom?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see the bottom, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's not so bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do manage to come out the other side, emerge, and take your breath. Now that you've been through it once, and managed to go through it a little more confidently, you didn't have to worry about holding your breath.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, are you okay?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. There's another room. There's five more of them, if I remember.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Those things?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're not done with this by a damn sight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Our job was to secure the safehouse. We can collapse this and say job done.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There were so many things. There were crates and objects.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That changes things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if the safehouse is that other tunnel? What if this whole thing is the safehouse?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could be underneath it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What if it's beyond even what Fjord has just seen? We do not know what we are talking about yet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We could guard this entrance and rest up for a bit, get ourselves together and carry through. It's not that far. I think everybody could make it. I certainly could help somebody if they're not a very good swimmer, but--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe run a line. Have the rope in case.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, we could rest up here on the back corner of this chamber. I could cast my silver thread across this pool here on the other side. If anything comes through, it wakes us up. We'll be ready. We get ready for going further and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could even cast the thread and sleep upstairs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We could. I know there are five, but I think we use this funnel point as a fatal funnel, right? We make them come through one at a time. We send some bait, bring them back through, but only when we're ready. What do you think?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm okay with that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cali?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I want to help you guys, I really do, but if what I'm looking for is not here, I've got to try and find it. I've got to stop these people getting it. The longer I spend here, if it's not here, the better chance they have of finding it, and I can't let that happen.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What if you spend one more night with us, here?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I really want to, Mr. Caleb. Like, you all seem so nice and you're the first people I could even say that I've made friends with, but this is too important.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just can't believe we didn't find that bowl for you.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Maybe I messed up. Like I said, I'm not very good in the outside world, and I thought that I found it here, but-- It's fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tell us again. What do you need it for? What are your intentions with it? Honestly, look me in the eye. What do you mean to do with this thing when you find it?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Mr. Caleb, I want to destroy it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How will you destroy it?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: To be honest with you, I don't know. I know I'll find a way if I have to, but-- I just-- The biggest thing I'm afraid of is that the cult and Serissa, they'll find somebody like me. They'll find somebody descended from an ancient dragon like I was. Then they can do this all again. I got away once. I can't let that happen to someone else.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yasha, will you come here, please?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I need your help. Mollymauk, will you come here, please?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Beauregard, Fjord, will you come here, please?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I start to move away from Cali.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why don't you want me to come here, please?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would you come back with me, Jester, please?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whatever.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: (softly) What's going on?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Once there is a defensive wall between me and Cali, I pull the bowl out of my bag.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Where did you find that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Caleb, you found the bowl! I'm so proud of you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (Jester voice) "I'm so proud of you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, Kiri's proud of you, too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, Kiri. Bren found the bowl. Cali, I would like to help you, but this thing is... powerful.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I met you ten hours ago?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Mr. Caleb, all I can tell you is that the whole reason I came here is to find that, so-- Let me put it this way. You care about these people? You care about this group?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I do.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Then don't keep that thing. The cult will find you. I know more about them than you. I can hide. I can stay away from them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I have a wonderful compromise. You know, we can all camp down here as I suggested, you included. In the morning, my good friend Jester can get to the bottom of your intentions for good. For real.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Caleb's still holding the bowl?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I snatch it out of his hand real quick?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead. Make a dexterity check, opposed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just a straight dex check?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do I do, dex as well? Oh, it's gonna be so good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Disadvantage for you because you weren't expecting it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Aw, the second one was an 18. Aw. Three.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bowl leaves your hand. Now Beau's holding it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm playing a game of keep-away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you natural Beau or big-ass Beau?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's faded.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (sing-songy) Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why would you not want to wait 12 hours to see if this woman's intentions are true or not?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What difference does it make?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What difference does it make?! This bowl--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't have it in your hand anymore, Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This bowl that I am talking about can be used to speak to one of the most evil entities in the history of creation, so I think it warrants another 12 hours of waiting to get to the bottom of things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think you should stop someone from talking to a god if they want to talk to a god.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I don't want to talk to her. I want to make that clear.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If you want to destroy it, why don't we just destroy it right here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think it can be.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I always thought you'd need something more impressive to do that, but if we can destroy it here, then so be it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think it is going to be a little bit beyond your capabilities to destroy this bowl, Yasha.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, I don't mean me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Caleb, I respect you and all of your intentions, but your caution does not get to control other people's destinies.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That bowl is used for communicating with (nervous laugh) the mother of dragons.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Are you going to rest now? Are we doing anything else? Are you resting now, or do you wish to take this time now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You had no intentions of wanting this bowl, or needing this bowl, or caring about this bowl until Cali came around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If they're not, we'll find out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I believe you, Cali. I don't think I need to cast it on you.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: But you need to trust each other.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, here's an insane thing that occurred to me. Technically speaking, Charm Person lasts a really long time. I cast Friends.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Friends. One minute.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Well, I can cast Charm Person.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: You tried to cast something on your friend, the guide, right? To make him tell the truth. Do that on me. I won't resist it. I promise.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair. I'm into that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, okay. I suggest you tell us the absolute truth of your intentions with this bowl.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I don't want to resist it, so: I intend to either destroy it, or find somewhere secure that the Cult of the Caustic Heart, servants of the Scaled Tyrant, can't find it, because they knew my power. They knew that I'm descended from an ancient black dragon from far away. If they find another one like me, they could do terrible things. I promise you, Mr. Caleb, I promise you that all I want is to right some of the wrongs that I once did as part of that group. I helped kill people; I helped torture people. I've got to make this right, and that's the only way I can do this. I don't know much, but I know that the only person that can take that thing and make sure it's not used for ill is me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mr. Caleb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (snickers) You have the helm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's only so many burdens we're expected to bear before we're asking for failure.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I don't want you to have to bear this one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm glad for you to take it. I'm a little surprised at the rest of you for me being cautious, but I'm glad for you to take it.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, no. I'm with you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I grab Caleb, drag him aside, hand Cali the bowl, drag Caleb over to a private corner, and I say, look. We all have our fucking trauma. You understand that? We all have our fucking garbage, and our dirt, and our shit. But you don't get to use your skeletons in your closet, your PTSD, to be shitty and control other people and what they want. It does not make you the authority on what's right and what's wrong. Just because you think that you're a shitty person, guess what? We're all fucking shitty people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not all of us are shitty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we separate or are we not separate?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's not being subtle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I get feeling like shitty people. I don't speak for the rest of these guys, but I get feeling shitty. But it doesn't mean that you get to impress that on other people and make them feel like shitheads just because you are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Beauregard, what if she had been lying to us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then she fucking lied to us. We take that, and we learn that as a lesson for later on.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Ms. Beauregard, if I can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, Cali?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: He was doing the right thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not blaming him. It's just that this isn't the first occurrence of something like this with him, either.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I think he's trying to do the right thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think he is, too.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (yelling) You were right, Caleb! You're just a shitty communicator!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's kind of what Molly said.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (yelling) Yep!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I told you exactly what I wanted to do, and why.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The road to hell is paved with good intentions.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know what you're talking about. And I walk away from her without saying another word.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I'm going to look at everybody. I really wish I could help you with the rest of this, but I've got to get this thing away from you, you know? People will be after this, as soon as I can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cali, be careful. There's trolls out there, and gators.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I'll be careful.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cali, I'm just curious. You don't want to try and smash it on the ground real fast? Just for shits and giggles.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I can try.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I mean, while we're all here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've never played with a magical item before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You throw it on the ground. It rolls off, untouched.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I'll try Acid Splash as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All the acid runs off of it, unscathed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha, chuck that shit on the side of the wall, will you?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, is it magical?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Super-duper.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Highly.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll try to do it. Might not work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You're going to strike it as you're dispelling it? Is that what you're doing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You hold your Magician's Judge up, you lift it over your head, and swing it down with all your might. Go ahead and make the check for the Dispel Magic on the sword.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What's that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's under the description of the sword on your app. It's a d20 plus-- Not the attack roll; it's under the ability.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: --cast as a 3rd-level and the ability check bonus for the spell is plus three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so roll and add three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. As you strike downward, there's a brief moment where you see a flash of energy as if the field is temporarily dissipating whatever magical connection this object holds. In that brief, ever-so-subtle instance of time in which this marble bowl is left in a brief blip in history, it is exposed to the elements. The blade carves through and shatters. The glow, (explosion)! For that instance, there is a brief burst of bright green, blue, red, white, black energy that emanates and this low growling rumble. And, with that, the bowl and whatever enchantment it held is gone.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: You did it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: No! Yasha, you destroyed it! That's exactly what I wanted to do! I didn't think it'd be possible!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I really didn't either. I just--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I owe you the biggest drink. Oh my god!

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Ms. Yasha, though, you need to be careful. I mean, that thing was connected to the Scaled Tyrant and the cultists. If they find out what you've done, they'll come after you. But I want you to know I'll do whatever I can to stop them.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, hey, (stutters) I just-- I didn't think that was going to happen so fast, to be honest.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I don't think any of us did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's interesting. As it shattered and while you're having this conversation, there's this static electricity around Yasha. Occasionally, as she brings her hand closer, you watch as these little bolts of energy are arcing through here. As it slowly fades, you can see there's a slight faint glow of the symbol she holds at her belt that eventually goes mundane as well.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Can I rush over and hug Yasha for what she's done? I throw my arms around you, draconic claw piercing in a little bit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I keep my arms down, but I give her a pat.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Thank you so much. You don't understand what this means.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You're welcome. I'm glad it was me and not you so you don't get in trouble or you're not marked or anything.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I'm sure that the Scaled Tyrant is looking for me in other ways, but thank you. You guys, I've never had people look after me and help me like this before. You guys are probably the first friends I've ever had. Where do you guys normally stay, if I need to come and find you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're actually traveling all around. I was going to ask: Where do you go now, since you've achieved your objective?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I'll head back to Port Damali. There's other artifacts I need to find and destroy, but now I know that they can be. That's what I'm going to focus on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We might find our way down to the Menagerie Coast at some point, and if we do, we'll give you a look.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Can I write to you if I leave letters? Can we be pen pals, Jester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, I will send all the letters, Cali!

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Oh, yes, absolutely!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That would make me so happy!

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I'm going to write you letters all the time!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to write you letters back all the time, okay?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Hugs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hugs, hugs, hugs.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I do have a question. The jewels in the bowl: are they still there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What jewels?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: In the eyeballs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check to search for where the shards all landed.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I'm going to start putting some of my stuff together to get ready to leave, but I'm going to head over to Nott, because Caleb's walked off.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Nott-- Bren?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can just go with Nott.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Okay. You seem to know Mr. Caleb really well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Can you give him something for me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I'm going to give Nott the Scroll of Invisibility that I never used. This is for your help, for Mr. Caleb's help, and all of you. It's not much, but it's something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is very nice of you.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: You don't know what you've done for me, so this is the least I can do. I really do understand what he did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He has-- yes.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're welcome? Thank you. It was lovely to meet you-- and he really does have the best of intentions.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I know he does, and I'm sure he's going to be a really powerful wizard one day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know he will be.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I know he will.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, he will! Why are you saying it like that? Because he will.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Because you are!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay! (laughter)

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I'll say my goodbyes and come up and shake Fjord's hand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Strong grip.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I won't use the dragon one. Go up to Mollymauk, shake hands.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, the dragon one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The dragon one.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Thank you?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I wouldn't have skinned you, that was just a joke in the beginning.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Oh, good. Don't do that, please.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I won't-- (quietly) I would have, but I just--

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Good luck with clearing this out, but I've got to go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Be careful, okay?

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I will, I promise. We'll write letters.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, of course!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Remember, follow the daggers on the way out, they mark your way.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I will do. Yeah, I've got to keep out for that troll, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We were supposed to get some sort of bracelet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Troll, and also really big alligators.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Well, you got my scroll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Over shit!

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: I'll make my way out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Cali climbs the rope, with a brief glimmer of her feet vanishing into the tunnel above. You all settle in to rest and decide what you're going to do with the rest of this chamber, if anything. And that's where we'll end tonight's game.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Drama!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good drama! It's fun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I love you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dram-o-mine!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh man. Good game. Mark, thank you for coming on!

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: No, thank you guys all so much! I've said this to Matt, but I've been hearing stories of Vox Machina since before you guys started streaming from Matt, and I've watched the whole show, so this was super awesome to get to be here and play with you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tell them where to find you on High Rollers!

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Yeah, so if you'd like to see me GM, I do a show called High Rollers every Sunday at 5:00pm UK-time. I think it's like 9:00am PST? That's on twitch.tv/Yogscast. We just finished our first two-and-a-half-year campaign, but on July 1st, we're starting our brand new campaign.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: That'll be our brand-new thing, so please come and watch that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: God, I can't believe that's already been that long.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Well, when you guys started, we were inspired by Crit Role, and we started our show, and we've gotten to the next part of our adventures.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yogscast is great, you guys are great, the cast is great--

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: High Rollers is great, I'm not going to talk about the rest of Yogscast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, High Rollers is great!

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Yeah, you can also see me on the Stream of Many Eyes. I'm going to be DMing a game for Ashley, Taliesin, and Sam on Sunday, along with some other people as well.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can't wait.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Thank you guys all so much, that was awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you for coming.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, Cali!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [music]
